Fearful of what we might do to in retribution for the murder of Alexander Griboyedov, the Shah has unleashed his wrath on those responsible for his murder. The ordinary citizenry, the mullahs, even his own advisers, none were safe. This has done much to wipe out the anti-Russian establishment, yet without this power base, it also left the Shah vulnerable. Surely his weakend position has created an opportunity to strengthen our influence in at his court?

An unexpected guest arrived at court today: the grandson of the Shah himself! And he comes baring gifts. 88.7 carats worth of gifts: the Shah Diamond. Taken as a war trophy by the Persians almost 100 years ago, it is one of the most treasured heirlooms of the Persian court. And today it is offered as a sincere apology for the events surrounding the Tehran legation, should we choose to forget that unfortunate incident.
The Persians have defiantly rejected every approach and offer we tried to make to settle the issues surrounding the death of Alexander Griboyedov.

The Russians have expressed their approval of our swift action in bringing the perpetrators of the murder of Alexander Griboyedov to justice and cleaning out the anti-Russian sentiment oh so prevalent in Tehran recently. Even going as far as graciously offering material and technical assistance to strengthen our administration, should we so desire.
The End to the Legation Crisis
The Russians have accepted our efforts to right the wrongs of Alexander Griboyedov's death.
The Persians have agreed to our proposal to sent Russian advisers.

Our response to the vicious murder of Alexander Griboyedov has rattled the Shah. Fearful of what we might do, he has offered us sweeping economic influence in Azerbaijan, if we are willing to come to terms with the death of Griboyedov and forget about all about this nasty event...

The incident at the Russian Legation had quickly spiralled out of control when the mob stormed the building and found that the envoy, Alexander Griboyedov, had raped the women who had sought refuge at the Legation. The crowd, enraged by what they found, quickly took Griboyedov outside and publicly executed him. An unfortunate, but not unjustified, act. The Russians might, however, have viewed this attack on their legal representative differently, perhaps even angrily. For weeks we have waited on a Russian response, yet none has come. Not even a rider with an official message.\nPerhaps the Russians aren't as fearsome as we thought?

The Shah of Persia has found himself in somewhat of a pickle after a rousey rabble stormed the Russian Legation in Tehran and killed the envoy Alexander Griboyedov. Apparently Griboyedov stuck his head in some nasty business involving an eunuch and two former harem girls, and the Persians did not take kindly to this. Decapitated, body mutilated, head found on display at a local kebab place, just terrible. The Russians are, understandably, somewhat upset about this, and are threatening war to avenge Griboyedov. The Shah, not one to risk losing another war to Russia, has appealed to us for protection.
The British seem very inclined to support us in our confrontation with the Russians.
The British do not seem to be inclined to help us against should the Russians decided to avenge Griboyedov.

Despite our most best efforts, the Russians have rejected all our approaches peacefully settle the issues surrounding the storming of the Legation and the unfortunate death of Alexander Griboyedov. It seems nothing will stop the insatiable Russian hunger except land...
Our response to the vicious murder of Alexander Griboyedov has rattled the Shah. If we are willing to forget this whole situation, he is willing to come to terms with a modest loss of land...

The nature of the Ottoman border has always led it to be a source of friction between our empires. While officially the border was demarcated by the Treaty of Zuhab, the tribes on both sides of the border have little regard for this border. They regularly migrate across it, and play governors off eachother to assert their independence.\nTensions have now reached a boiling point: A high ranking Turkish officer from Baghdad, who had sought refugee at our court, was, together with some of our officers, kidnapped and beheaded by the Ottomans. While at the same time the governor of Van has been instigating rebellion among the Azeri tribes along the border. Lastly, we should not forget the Wahabis raiding our pilgrims to Mecca and Karbala, something the Ottomans are not combatting and sometimes engaging in themselves.\nShould we decided to press the issue, the Russian Tsar has promised his support.

The nature of the Persian border has always led it to be a source of friction between our empires. While officially the border was demarcated by the Treaty of Zuhab, the tribes on both sides of the border have little regard for this border. They regularly migrate across it, and play governors off eachother to assert their independence.

Tensions had been running high for some time now. The Persians have openly been supporting Kurdish tribes raiding our provinces, allowing them to cross into Persia for safety. At the same time they provide refugee to prominent opponents of our rule in the east.
The Persians now cite the retrieval of one of these dissidents, as well as mistreatment of Shi'a pilgrims to Karbala and Mecca, as reason for war!

The war with the Ottomans has been ongoing for some time now with no end in sight. A treaty to end the war has been drawn up. To prevent future conflict the terms of the treaty include no territorial changes. The movement of tribes along the border is to be regulated and, pledging non-interference in one another's internal affairs, neither side will grant political asylum to their opponents respective dissidents.

The war with the Persians has been ongoing for some time now with no end in sight. A treaty to end the war has been drawn up. To prevent future conflict the terms of the treaty include no territorial changes. The movement of tribes along the border is to be regulated and, pledging non-interference in one another's internal affairs, neither side will grant political asylum to their opponents respective dissidents.
The Ottomans have accepted the terms of the Treaty of Erzurum.
The Ottomans have repudiated the terms of the Treaty of Erzurum.

'Caucasus! Bow down your snowy head.
Submit! Yermolov Marches!' - Pushkin

The Treaty of Gulistan was supposed to end the struggle over the Caucasus between the Russian Empire and us. However tensions remain high as ever, and peace is bought at a bloody price as Russian Viceroy Yermolov employs a reign of terror to subdue the Caucasian tribes. Yet that is not the only source of tension: Yermolov accusses us of not fulfilling the territorial clauses of the Treaty, claiming Kapan belongs to Russia. Of course, it does not, but he has occupied the northern shore of lake Gokcha -a position from where he can threaten Erivan- to force us to the negotation table. How should we respond?

The Treaty of Gulistan was supposed to settle the conflict over the Caucasus between us and the Persians, and bring peace and stability to the region. Yet everyday new reports of uprising, massacres and general nastiness come in. Unfortunately we must conclude that the Persians have failed to abide by the treaty, and we suspect they actively support the rebels.\nBy pressuring the Persians governor Yermolov has managed to abide by at least one article of the treaty: The Persians have evacuated the region around Kapan and seceded control to us.

The Treaty of Gulistan was supposed to settle the conflict over the Caucasus between us and the Persians, and bring peace and stability to the region. Yet everyday new reports of uprising, massacres and general nastiness come in. Unfortunately we must conclude that the Persians have failed to abide by the treaty, and we suspect they actively support the rebels.\nUnder the Treaty of Gulistan the region around Kapan was to be seceded to us by the Persians, yet nothing could motivate the Persians to evacuate the region. In a bold move, the governor of Tiflis Yermolov has now seized the northern shore of Lake Gokcha [Gyumri] as just compensation for the territory we lost.

Given the unwillingness of the Persians to fulfill their obligations under the Treaty of Gulistan, it should come as no suprise that the situation in the Caucasus would devolve into war at one point or another. It seems that we have arrived at that one point!

The regular council at Sultanieh -the Shah's summer residence- is promising to turn into a historic gathering this year. Yermolov, claiming we have failed in our obligation to evacuate Kapan, continues to press our northern border. Now he has seized control over more territory around Lake Gokcha, and is now in a position to directly threaten Erivan. Yet this aggressive action belies the truth of the Russian's situation: Their empire is at the verge of civil war, with Russian princes are at eachother's throat, fighting for the throne. There are those who say the time to strike Russians is now: To avenge the continued humilation the Russians subject us too and liberate our Muslim brethren from Yermolov's oppression! Yet there are also those who argue caution, that the Russians are not to be underestimated, and that we should seek an accomodation with them.

The regular council at Sultanieh -the Shah's summer residence- is rapidly turning into a momentous occassion. The Russians have pressed their claim and assumed control over the Kapan region. Yet this aggressive action belies the truth of the Russian situation: Their empire is at the verge of civil war, with Russian princes are at eachother's throat, fighting for the throne. There are those who say the time to strike the Russians is now: To avenge the continued humilation the Russians subject us too and liberate our Muslim brethren from Yermolov's oppression! Yet there are also those who argue caution, that the Russians are not to be underestimated, and that as such we should seek an accomodation with them.

The Council of Sultanieh -the yearly army army review and the opportunity to pay homage to the Persian Shah- was quite an eventful occassion this year. Wild voices were pushing for war, to restore the Persian Empire in the Caucasus and, by radical fanatics -the ulama- in specific, to avenge the 'atrocities' commit against the peoples of the Caucasus. Yet we also had allies at court arguing for restraint and the futility of war against us. In the end, however, the deciding voice was our emissary who mananged to covince the Shah that there was no ill will on our part. His audience with the Shah was even so successful, that the Shah has resorted to settling some minor border disputes around $PROVINCENAME$.

Yermolov is making outrages accusation to our adress: He purported to have intercepted a caravan leaving Erivan carrying silver and arms for the Caucasians fighting their Russian oppressors. He claims that these actions were directed by Abbas Mirza under a policy of 'no peace, no war', which aims to strengthen Mirza's position as crown prince by stirring up trouble for the Russians in the Caucasus. Yermolov is demanding the right to build military posts on the road from Tabriz to Erivan to intercept future shipments of arms destined for the rebels.

Long have we suspected the court of Tabriz of stirring up trouble in the Caucasus under a policy of 'no peace, no war' in order to strengthen Abbas Mirza's claim to the Persian throne. And recently we finally found the evidence we need: A caravan leaving from Erivan carrying Persian silver and arms destined for the Caucasian rebels. Viceroy Yermolov has now moved to quickly block the road from Tabriz to prevent future shipments!\n[You gained Nakhichevan]

Yermolov has used his positions in Nakhichevan to close off all lines of communication between Tabriz and Erivan. It is now effectively cut off from our empire! As for the motivation for Yermolov to do so? We can only guess...

Despite out best efforts to find an amicable settlement in the Caucasus, the Persians persist in trying to undermine our position there. Even more evidence has emerged detailing the involvement of Tabriz and Erivan in the war. As a result, Viceroy Yermolov has now blockaded Erivan to force them into submission, and end their support for the rebels. The Shah has made it known to us that he had no knowledge of the involvement of Erivan in the affair, and leaves it to us how to settle the matter with the court of Erivan.

With the defeat of Persia's armies in the Caucasus, Russia forced a humiliating peace upon the Shah. Persia conceded control of all of its Caucasian lands to Russia, as well as formally renouncing its claims to Armenia and Azerbaijan.
We have wrested the Azeri khanates from Russia's control and can reestablish Persian rule in the southern Caucasus. This is a proud day for Persia!

The Persian state was, at this time, a extremely decentralised state akin to the feudal states of Europe, with local lords controlling their own lands, raising their own taxes and maintain their own armies. Only a nominal sort of recognition was extended to the Shah, and in times of weakeness rebellions could spring up.\n\nThe recent sorry show of the Shah in the Caucasus is an indication of his weakeness, perhaps it is time to assert our independence?

Control over the outlying regions been more nominal than real, with local maintain their own de facto independence and only begrudgingly accepting our overlordship. Any sign of weakeness could be a trigger for our nobles to turn against and try and establish their own state.\n\nOur recent poor showing in the Caucasus has given rise for the rulers of $FROMCOUNTRY$ to declare their independence from us!
AI EVENT, YOU SHOULDN'T BE SEEING ME

$PROVINCENAME$ has turned into a powderkeg due to the blundering of a local magistrate: An Armenian man, who was accused of raping a young boy, was released on account of his connection to the Russian legation, and, in a suprise turnaround, those who had apprehended him were arrested on charges of killing the consul's dog...\n\nOpportunistic Ulama have taken this to incite anti-Christian riots, and a crowd has now gathered at the arg [citadel] to demand redress for this 'unjust treatment of Muslims'...

The $FROMPROVINCE$ Legation has found itself in a rather tight spot: following the release of a local Armenian in our employ and the subsequent arrest -apparently on charges of killing our consul's dog- of those who had brought the Armenian in, major rioting erupted in $FROMPROVINCE$ threatening the property and lives of all Christians and Westerners in the city. The $FROMPROVINCE$ governor seems totally uninterested in quelling the riots, instead delivering the -rather blunt- note concerning to the legation:\n'Give up the servant who violated the boy and I will stop the row.'

We received word from the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ envoy that they have, in the interest of justice, removed the offending Armenian from the legation's payrole, and will be handed over to the $PROVINCENAME$i magistrate to stand trial on the earliest convenience.

'Nuts!' That is the response of the Russian consul to our not unreasonable request to try the Armenian who violated the young $PROVINCENAME$i boy. This response has not be helpful in quelling public anger and, encouraged by the same militant Ulama, $PROVINCENAME$ is now on the verge of a general uprising...

'Nothing could possibly exceed his gallant conduct and anxiety and extertion to quell the disturbances, and especially to prevent the mob from approaching this consulate and the houses of British subject. He visited them all several times during the day, and at night called to satisfy himself that the guards were alert. ' -British consul in $FROMPROVINCE$ on the performance of the local garison commander.\n\nThe $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ have prudently decided to quell the unrest in $FROMPROVINCE$ by sending in the garrison, rather than seek a confrontation with us. Note should be given to the $PROVINCENAME$i garrison commander who excelled himself in his diligence in protecting the foreign and Christian inhabitants of the city.

Earlier this century our consul in Tehran was brutally murdered on trumped up rape charges, after he offered protection to an Armenian and his family who wished to move to our Empire. Today we received word that the our $FROMPROVINCE$ legation was again violated as the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$s sought to subject the Armenian to their own 'justice'. Once more the Cossack guards fought bravely, and once more they succumbed to the vile heap massed against them!

The $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$s have not taken kindly to us forcing our way into the $PROVINCENAME$ legation: they have declared war, and simultaneously the Western nations have declared their disaproval of our actions...
All Quiet on the Northern Front

The incident at the $PROVINCENAME$ Legation and our forceful securing of the offending Armenian could have easily been viewed as cause for war by the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$s. Yet for weeks we have waited on a $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ response, and none has come. Not even a rider with an official message.
A new faith is rapidly gaining ground in Persia. Promulgated by a man calling himself 'the Bab', it proclaims that the Qa'im, the redeemer, has arrived on Earth.

Proclaiming that the Qa'im, the Redeemer, has returned to Earth, the 'Bab's' teachings are rapidly gaining ground in Persia. Claiming divine inspiration, the Bab has set about renewing and reinterpreting the Shia faith of Persia, much to the chagrin of the conservative clergy.

Claiming that he is the gateway to the Qa'im, redeemer of the world, the so called Bab is rapidly gaining followers for his radical new take on the Islamic faith. Doing away with old certainties and replacing them with new interpretations, much to the chagrin of the conservative clergy. The Bab is so far removed from the established faith that the ulama have now called upon the Shah to try him for apostasy, a crime which carries the death penalty.
After a failed assassination attempt on the Shah of Persia, dozens of Babi converts were brutally executed while many more have disappeared into the deep dungeons.

After a failed assassination attempt while out hunting, the Shah of Persia has unleashed his wrath on those of the Babi faith responsible. Dozens have been executed in the most gruesome way imaginable while hundreds more have disappeared into the deep dungeons.

Following a failed assassination attempt while out hunting partridges, the Shah of Persia has unleashed his faith community of those responsible: the Babi's. The brutal crackdown has resulted in dozens being executing by the most heinous of methods, a few by the methoed of sham'ajin - holes drilled into his body to hold candles in a celebration of the Shah's survival before being cleaved in half - while many more have been relegated to the darkest dungeons.
Led by religious clergy and the merchant classes, Persia is experiencing a popular uprising against the Tobacco Regie: The foreign owner tobacco monopoly.

A popular uprising in Persia against the foreign owned Tobacco Regie which has monopolised the market. Despite a recent arrival to Persia, it has become thoroughly ingrained in local culture. The protests hope to compel the abolition of the Regie.

Persian clergy have interdicted the use of tobacco, with the view of compelling the abolition of the Tobacco Regie, regarding exports as wel as interiour trade. They also clamour for the expulsion of the members of the tobacco corporation. Yesterday a riotous mob assambled at the Shah's palace to demand satisfaction. The Shah's son, also minister of war, failt to pacify the mob, en a detachment of troops was then ordered to disperse the rioters. Several persons were killed in the encounter. The feeling of alarm is yet to subside.
Two years of drought have conspired to cause a terrible famine in $COUNTRY$. As bread prices increase many fold, the populace is left starving.

Two years of drought have conspired to cause a terrible famine in $COUNTRY$. As bread prices increase many fold, the desperate populace is left eating cats, dogs, rats or grass. Either that or face starvation.

Two years of drought have conspired to cause a terrible famine in $COUNTRY$. As bread prices doubled in Tehran and increased many fold in the country side, the population is left eating cats, dogs, rats, or grass. All the while the rich landowners hoard their grain supply, even purposely disrupt relieve supplies, to increase the value of their stock. Even the profitable grain shipments to India haven't been halted. And all the while the poor populace starves to death.
A new religious movement has emerged in India. Founded when Mirza Ghulam Ahmad proclaimed himself the renewer of the Islamic faith. The Ahmaddiyya now believe him to be messiah.

A new religious movement is gaining ground in India. Founded when Mirza Ghulam Ahmad proclaimed himself the renewer of the Islamic faith. The Ahmaddiyya now believe him to be Messiah. The Indian religious authorities are less than impressed of his claims.

A new religious movement is gaining ground in India. Founded by Mirza Ghulam Ahmad when he proclaimed himself the promised -once a century- renewer of the Islamic faith. However his followers, the Ahmaddiyya, have now come to believe that he is the Islamic Mahdi, the promised Messiah, sent to rid the world of evil. The Indian religious authorities are, however, less than impressed of his claims. They have proclaimed his believes beliefs blasphemous and tantamount to apostasy.
The women in Tehran have taken to the streets protesting their unequal treatment. In protest they have taken off the veil, the item of clothing making them invisible in normal life.

The women of $COUNTRY$ have long been relegated to secondary citizen status by Islamic tradition. Protesting their treatment, the women of Tehran have taken to the streets and removed the veil: the Islamic item of clothing symbolising their oppression.

Under Islamic law it is forbidden for women to interact with, or be seen by, unrelated males. This has reduced the domain of Muslim women to that of the home, while on the streets they are forced to wrap themselves 'in black bags from head to the toe without even an opening to breathe.' Protesting their unequal treatment, the women of Tehran have now taken to the streets and removed the veil: the symbol of their oppression.
$COUNTRY$ has taken possession of the port city of Bandar Abbas after Oman fails to meet her obligations under their lease treaty. The city had been ceded to Oman in the late 18th century.

Changing political circumstances in the Persian Gulf region cause $COUNTRY$ to retake possession of the port city of Bandar Abbas. The city had been ceded to Oman in the late 18th century, although the treaty was renewed under more stringent terms recently.

Changing political and economic circumstances in the Persia Gulf region cause $COUNTRY$ to retake possession of the port city of Bandar Abbas. This strategic city on the Strait of Hormuz was ceded to Oman in the late 18th century, although after the split of sultanate $COUNTRY$ managed to renegotiate the lease on more favourable terms. Oman has failed to meet these terms and the territory has reverted to $COUNTRY$.
A good deal of restlessness is reported in Kurdistan as bandits and rebels assert themselves in the wake of the recent $COUNTRY_ADJ$ military defeats and subsequent power vaccum.

Banditry and restlessness is on the rise in Kurdistan as the recent $COUNTRY_ADJ$ military defeats. Lacking any government or authority worthy of the name, local chieftains have filled the gap and are reported to be expanding their power bases, possibly eyeing independence.

Insurgent Kurds depredations on government outposts and towns are becoming increasingly widespread in Kurdistan. Benefiting from the recent $COUNTRY_ADJ$ military defeats, the local chieftains have been able to exploit the subsequent the lawlessness and disorder to expand their power base. Without there being anything worthy of the name $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government or authority in the border lands, it would seem independence is not far off.
British alarmed as $FROMCOUNTRY$ is forced to sign humiliating treaty ceding all territory and claims north of the Atreck River to $COUNTRY$.

The British Foreign Office has expressed its concern over the recent developments in Central Asia. In a major diplomatic victory, $COUNTRY$ has forced $FROMCOUNTRY$ to relinquish all territories and claims north of the Atreck River, bringing them to the doorstep of India.

In a stunning diplomatic victory, the humiliated $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$s have been forced to relinquish all territories and claims north of the Atreck river to $COUNTRY$. A brazen move which has solidified $COUNTRY$s hold over Central Asia and brought them to the doorstep of India. The $COUNTRY_ADJ$ expansion, however, has not gone unnoticed in the British Foreign Office.
War has only narrowly been avoided as tensions flare up between $COUNTRY$ and $FROMCOUNTRY$ over control of Central Asia.

In a major diplomatic victory, $COUNTRY$ has forced $FROMCOUNTRY$ to sign a humiliating treaty. Under the treaty of Akhal $FROMCOUNTRY$ relinquishes all rights and territories north of the Atreck river. The British Foreign Office has reacted with alarm.

While the relations have been amicable, though perhaps not friendly, a confrontation between $COUNTRY_ADJ$s and $FROMCOUNTRY$ over Central Asia was all but inevitable: As $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$'s influence wanes in Central Asia, $COUNTRY$'s penetrates ever deeper. In an effort to clearly delineate their respective sphere's of influence, the $COUNTRY_ADJ$s proposed the Atreck River as the common border. An humiliating and unacceptable territorial concession to the $COUNTRY_ADJ$s. Only severe pressure and the threat of war, managed to change the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$s mind.
Tensions flare up between $COUNTRY$ and $FROMCOUNTRY$ as negotiations to delineate the common border break down. War is all but assured.

Tensions are running high between $COUNTRY$ and $FROMCOUNTRY$ as negotiations to delineate the common border break down. It would seem $FROMCOUNTRY$ is defiant in the face of overwhelming $COUNTRY_ADJ$ might. It seems unlikely war can be avoided.

While the relations have been amicable, though perhaps not friendly, a confrontation between $COUNTRY_ADJ$s and $FROMCOUNTRY$ over Central Asia was all but inevitable: As $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$'s influence wanes in Central Asia, $COUNTRY$'s penetrates ever deeper. In an effort to clearly delineate their respective sphere's of influence, the $COUNTRY_ADJ$s proposed the Atreck River as the common border. An humiliating and unacceptable territorial concession to the $COUNTRY_ADJ$s. With no agreement forthcoming the matter will have to be settled on the field of battle.
The Durrani Empire is no more. Torn down by internal strive. Today a new Emir took control of Kabul. Whether he'll succeed in reuniting the tribes is yet to be seen.

The Durrani Empire is no more. Maybe it never really was. Torn down by tribal rivalries and petty disputes. A new Emir emerged and took control in Kabul today, whether he'll succeed in reuniting the tribes is yet to be seen.

The Durrani Empire is no more. Maybe it never was. The tribal nature of the Afghan people is be independent and resist outside domination. Uniting the tribes into one Empire was itself a miracle of balancing tribal alliances and hostilities, relying on directing tribal energies away from rebellion. Lacking the gift of diplomacy, the recent Durrani Shahs have allowed tribal rivalries to resurface and slowly the empire started disintegrating. Today a new Emir has taken control of Kabul. Whether he'll succeed in reuniting the tribes is yet to be seen.
The last war in the Caucasus ended with Russia left in control of the region. Hoping to take advantage of percieved Russian weakness, the Persians have declared war to reverse their losses!

The last war between the Russian and Persian Empire was settled decisively in the favour of Russia with the Treaty of Gulistan. However shortcomings and differing interpretations of the treaty caused tensions and has now led to war between the two empires!

The last war in the Caucasus between the Russian and Persian Empires had left the Caucasus under the control over the Russians, putting an end to the centuries long ties between Persia and the Caucasian peoples. The Treaty of Gulistan settling the war, however, had serious shortcomings and differing interpretations of the treaty kept tensions simmering between the two empires. Now, hoping to take advantage of percieved Russian weakness, the Persians have declared war in the hopes of restoring their prestige in and rule of the Caucasus.
The khanate of Erivan was the last Persian stronghold in the Caucasus, but today it fell into Russian hands. This act has pushed Persia out of the Caucasus in its totality.

The Russian Empire marked the completion of their conquest of the Caucasus today by taking control of Erivan. The last Persian stronghold in the region, it was seceded after the Russians successfully managed to isolate from the rest of Persia.

The Treaty of Gulistan had left Russia in control over the majority of the Caucasus, with Persia only holding on to the khanate of Erivan. However flaws in the Treaty of Gulistan and Russian action in the Caucasus left tensions simmering between the two empires. Erivan itself was a thorn in the Russian side, as it served to supply the rebels in the Caucasus. Under the spectre of war, however, the Russians managed to force the Persians to hand over the khanate to them.
The Russian envoy looked terribly pleased as the Persian attempt to restore their rule over the Caucasus resulted in them losing their last footholds in the region to Russia.

The Persian attempts to dislodge the Russians from the Caucasus and restore their rule over the region have ended in absolute failure. Under the humiliating terms of the peace treaty they have been forced to surrender their last footholds in the region.

Although few would have given the Persians a fighting chance against the Russian Empire, the totality of the Persian defeat came as a shock to all. After Tabriz fell there was nothing to stop the Russians from marching on Tehran, forcing the Persians into a humiliating peace treaty. The Persians fought to restore their prestige in and control over the region, but now are left with neither.
Somewhere in this world a mad man bet on the impossible: A Persian victory over the Russians in the Caucasus! Yet it did happen, and this man must have made a fortune!

Somewhere in this world a mad man bet on the impossible: A Persian victory over the Russians in their war over Caucasus! Yet it did happen, and this man must have made a fortune! We wonder if the war was fought honestly though.

In a series of events long held to be impossible, the Persians have managed to overcome the Russians in their war over the Caucasus. As all wars between these two powers have always resulted in a Persian defeat, the redaction of this newspaper is unsure how to proceed. Surely the Persians did not fight in honourable fashion?

We are interested in purchasing the territories west of the Essequibo River from Great Britain and integrating it into Venezuela. Having very good relations with the UK, an alliance with them or being a Great Power will greatly improve our chances of getting a deal

$FROMCOUNTRY$ has agreed to sell the territories west of the Essequibo river to us!

In the late nineteenth century, Jules Gros, a Journalist and member of the Société de Géographie, founded the Free Republic of Counani in a territory disputed by France (As French Guyana) and Brazil. He seeks to sell bonds for inexistent gold mines and make a fortune while also appointing himself as president for life of the newly-founded ghost republic. In France, he seeks recognition of this state as a free colony in order to gain their protection…
A plea from the Republic of Counani

Recognize Counani as a free colony of France

The gold rush in Guasipati has attracted many $COUNTRY_ADJ$ and foreign settlers to the province, which has nearly managed to collapse the old, run-down colonial town. We must employ this opportunity to settle the empty lands around the Imataca by founding a new mining town with an easier access to the gold fields. Foreign surveyors suggest the area near El Callao, one of the most productive gold deposits in the province, would be a good starting point for a new town

The recent gold rush deep in the jungles of the Colony of Suriname has left us in dire need of a safe and more efficient way of transporting the precious metals to the harbor in Paramaribo. Several different surveyors have all proposed a railway extending from the coast down south to the town of Apetina, from which the gold could be transported by locomotive, it would be wise to heed their advice

Given the success of the Lawa Railway, more and more tons of gold have been brought out from the mines in Tapahony. This translates to the need of more tracks, as well as an extension of the Lawa Railway closer to the mines of the Tapahoni. Our surveyors have already proposed a route and all that's left is to invest in the project
The second extension of the Lawa Railway

The formerly disputed territory of the Marouini is also rich in gold, but its hilly jungles have proven difficult for land transportation, leaving us to transport the precious minerals via fluvial routes. Our surveyors have suggested extending the Lawa Railway once again, but this time ir shall be done to reach the abundant gold fields located in the Upper Marouini basin
Vassalize the Free State of Counani

Ambitions of other Great Powers in the area of Counani are increasing, and it's time to tight our influence on them. Under a new treaty, the Counanois agreed not to enter into relationships with any foreign government other than $COUNTRY$ without its consent. In return, the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ promised to protect the Counani from all aggression by Brazil and to help in case of any invasions
Integrate the Free State of Counani
Counani, claimed by Brazil as part of their nation, is now in a position that facilitates their annexation to $COUNTRY$

The Dutch, our former colonial overlord, displaced a great quantity of Javanese people to be used as indentured laborers in the colony of Surinam in South America. It is our duty, as $COUNTRY$ to bring these people back to our domain… or rather, extend our domain to them. Our position in global politics has given us the opportunity to shake off colonial rule, as well as to claim these indentured workers, which have been settled in the Americas, as a rightful part of our realm. It is time to extend our rule over these people

The British, our former colonial overlords, displaced a great quantity of Indian peoples to be used as indentured laborers in their colonies all across the world, and adding insult to injury, they also sold many of them as indentured laborers other powers including France and the Netherlands. It is our duty, as $COUNTRY$, to bring these people back to our domain… or rather, extend our domain to them. Our position in global politics has given us the opportunity to shake off colonial rule, as well as to claim these indentured workers, as a rightful and integral part of our realm. It is time to extend our rule over these people
A formal delimitation for the Lawa-Tapahoni basins

The borders between French and Dutch Guiana have been subjected to proper delimitation on several occasions, the latest one being in 1860, but the discovery of gold in the area between the Lawa and the Tapanahoni Rivers created a new border conflict. Acting as a natural border between the two colonies, the Maroni River was selected as the frontier, but yet another question surfaced when both parties could not agree which river was the continuation and headwater of the Maroni: The Lawa to the east or the Tapahoni to the West. It is time to reach an agreement and subject this conflict to arbitration
A formal delimitation for the Lawa-Tapahoni basins

Expel the indentured Indian workers from Guyana

In the decades prior to our conquest, the British Empire brought a sizeable quantity of indentured foreign workers to the Guyanese territories west of the Esequibo, most of these people are of ethnic Indian origin, of which a portion still practice Islam and Hinduism… And while we might welcome them to our society, they are clearly incompatible with the ideals under which $COUNTRY$ was founded. Several of our most conservative statesmen have suggested expelling them to the territories east of the Esequibo River, which are currently being held by the British. Georgetown does possess a sizeable Indian population who will surely welcome their brethren with open arms, and our guess is that the British will not complain about getting some their former subjects back
Expel the indentured Indian workers from Trinidad and Tobago

In the decades prior to our conquest, the British Empire brought a sizeable quantity of indentured foreign workers to the islands of Trinidad and Tobago, most of these people are of ethnic Indian origin, of which a portion still practice Islam and Hinduism… And while we might welcome them to our society, they are clearly incompatible with the ideals under which $COUNTRY$ was founded. Several of our most conservative statesmen have suggested shipping them to the territories east of the Esequibo River, which are currently being held by the British. It appears that $FROMCOUNTRY$ has decided to expel all Indians from their territories. The expelled Indians should now be arriving to Georgetown, in our colony of $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Guiana

Great Britain lies defeated after the war which contested the territories claimed by the colony of British Guiana, which are now under our control. They have given us no choice but to take them by force, and as the victors, it is our duty to coerce them to sign a treaty which forfeited their claims on what rightfully belongs to the Tripartite Alliance

The British have given $FROMCOUNTRY$ no choice but to take them by force, and as the victor, $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$, as well as the United States of America, have coerced them to sign a treaty which forfeited their claims on what rightfully belongs to the Tripartite Alliance

We have advanced our methods of producing artillery. These must be communicated to our factories,so modern artillery may be mass-produced for our armies.

$COUNTRY_ADJ$ landowners in $PROVINCENAME$ have expressed interest in switching the local farms over to more profitable plantations, and away from the traditional farming of the locals-- which they say is far less efficient than the farms back home in $COUNTRY$ anyhow. This would be better for our colony in the long run.

Considering the levels of unemployment in $PROVINCENAME$, local landowners have begun a movement to switch to the production of cash crops-- in this case Sugar, which appears to suited to the local terrain. Whether such a plan would help $PROVINCENAME$ in the long run is unknown, but the landowners are asking for the government's assistance in promoting sugar production.

Considering the levels of unemployment in $PROVINCENAME$, local landowners have begun a movement to switch to the production of cash crops-- in this case spices, which appears to suited to the local terrain. Whether such a plan would help $PROVINCENAME$ in the long run is unknown, but the landowners are asking for the government's assistance in promoting spice production.

Considering the levels of unemployment in $PROVINCENAME$, local landowners have begun a movement to switch to the production of cash crops-- in this case Cocoa, which appears to suited to the local terrain. Whether such a plan would help $PROVINCENAME$ in the long run is unknown, but the landowners are asking for the government's assistance in promoting cocoa production.
Plantations have been started in this province to more efficiently and intensively farm it-- even though this comes with a risk of exhausting the farmland.
A new plantation has been started in this province, moving production over to cash crops rather than than the traditional farming which has been done here by the natives.
We have reports from $PROVINCENAME$ that a new vein of copper has been discovered, and considering the unemployment in $PROVINCENAME$ this might prove to be a boon indeed.
We have reports from $PROVINCENAME$ that a new vein of lead has been discovered, and considering the unemployment in $PROVINCENAME$ this might prove to be a boon indeed.
Unite the German Baltic Duchies by the Sword
If the Baltic Provinces are to be united, we must lay claim to all their territory - and reunite them by sword, if need be!
Unite the German Baltic Duchies Diplomatically
The Baltic Governorates must unite under a single flag and together achieve our destiny to topple foreign influences!

For hundreds of years, Lithuania stood as an enemy of our Ancestors - the first Germans in the Baltic - as well as resisting any incursions into their lands. This is no longer the case, as we are in position to lay claims on what our Ancestors could not: The Heartlands of Lithuania.
Now that we have laid claim to the Lithuanian lands, all that is left is to annex them.

The native peoples of the Baltic are backwards and uncivilized, luckily, we are here to bring civilization to them as our ancestors originally intended - With a strong countrywide schooling system which favors only those who can speak German.
We are hard at work towards an integration policy on the native populace of the Baltics.
An End to the Interim Government

The Interim Government of Poland was not build to last, in fact, we must now decide upon a governmental model for the future of our people. It should be noted that not all sectors of the population will be satisfied with the outcome of this decision, whatever it may be.
A Republican Government as we Promised.
A Noble Republic like the Commonwealth of old!
Federalists seek to place a federalist model of centralization on this nation.
Federalists sentiments have rose in $COUNTRY$, demanding for more autonomy in the core provinces!
The Federalist revolutionaries have spread to $PROVINCENAME$ like wildfire!
Federalists, now forming a majority in most regions, are demanding for more autonomy! But we know better than to simply give them what they want…
Very well, we shall adopt a Federalist model.
Federalists are stirring up trouble in our nation.
The people in this province are sympathetic to the Federalists.
With the adoption of a Federalist model the Rebels have calmed down, forfeiting their struggle in exchange of victory chants.

The Treaty of Trentschin was signed in the year 1335 between King Casimir III of Poland and King John of Bohemia It initiated the transfer of the suzerainty over the former Polish province of Silesia to the Bohemian Crownlands, whereafter the Duchies of Silesia were incorporated into the Bohemian Crown and later both the Austrian Empire and Prussia. With the advent of modern nationalism and Panslavism, many in $COUNTRY$'s intellectual circles have begun to wonder: Can Silesians be considered Poles, or even Slavic if anything, at all? Perhaps, but it is not for us politicians to decide… Although but we can surely exploit this conundrum by declaring Silesians a natural part of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ nation, this could give us a nice casus belli for their historical lands.

Pomerania was long ago part of the Polish realm, its people, the so-called Wends, were subdued and Polonized by the kings of old. However, hundreds of years have passed and the Wends of old are nothing but a small trace of Slavic -both Polish and Kashubian- settlements in the region, and while no longer the majority due to the constant Germanization efforts of the Prussians, we are in position to claim our fellow Kashubians and Poles living there as part of the Polish nation.

With the rise of nationalism and German oppression, the muffled calls for union with Lithuania Proper among the Prussian Lithuanians living in Memelland and Lithuania Minor can be heard throughout our nation. Their pleas cannot go unanswered, for that very reason several Prussian Lithuanian intellectuals have crossed the border intending to sign the Act of Tilsit - eponymous to the very same city in East Prussia - in which the leaders of the Prussian Lithuanian community wish to unite with their brothers across the border. And while their culture and language are slightly distinct to ours, we cannot miss this opportunity to annex even more territories. In any case, for this act to take effect, we must first render the Treaty of Melno - which defined the Prusso-Lithuanian borders in 1422 - null in the eyes of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ law.

With the rise of nationalism and German oppression, the muffled calls for union with Lithuania Proper among the Prussian Lithuanians living in Memelland and Lithuania Minor can be heard throughout the land. Their pleas cannot go unanswered, for that very reason several Prussian Lithuanian intellectuals have crossed the border intending to sign the Act of Tilsit - eponymous to the very same city in East Prussia - in which the leaders of the Prussian Lithuanian community wish to unite with their brothers across the border. And while their culture and language are slightly distinct to our Lithuanian Vassals, we cannot miss this opportunity. With the rise of nationalism and German oppression, the muffled calls for union with Poland among the Masurians living in East Prussia can be heard throughout our nation. Their pleas cannot go unanswered, for that very reason several Masurian intellectuals have crossed the border intending to sign the Jansbork Plan - the name local Masurians have given to the city of Johannisburg - in which the leaders of the Masurian community wish to unite with their brothers across the border. And while their culture and language are slightly distinct to ours, we cannot miss this opportunity to annex even more territories.

North German power has waned throughout the last decades in an event attributed to the rise of $COUNTRY$ in the global stage, yet in spite of this there still remains a small, the almost exclusively German exclave in the province of Königsberg, which to $COUNTRY_ADJ$ politicians is an absolute eyesore to look at. For this very reason they have devised a most astute plan: Releasing a German Puppet state to lay claims on the exclave province… And what better German Puppet than one styled after the Ducal Prussia of old? Indeed, ever since the State of Prussia lost most of its Prussian holdings, it should no longer bear its name, therefore, we should release a pretender state which can AND will rightfully bear the name of Prussia. This state will lay claims over Königsberg as its original capital, forfeiting any non-Prussian claims in the area and if the no-longer-Prussian Germans refuse to hand over the exclave we can take this to another stage: War.

$COUNTRY_ADJ$ power has waned throughout the last decades in an event attributed to the rise of $FROMCOUNTRY$ in the global stage, yet in spite of this there still remains a small, the almost exclusively $COUNTRY_ADJ$ exclave in the province of Königsberg, which according to $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ politicians it is "an absolute eyesore to look at." For this very reason $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ -in an unprecedented act of revanchism- has issued an ultimatum to the $COUNTRY_ADJ$s: Hand over Königsberg to its rightful owner, the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ puppet of Ducal Prussia, or face dire consequences. By their twisted logic, the treaty of Melno of 1425 -Which defined $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$-Prussian borders- has been forfeited as we are no longer the real Prussia due to our severe territorial loses in the region and instead they have opted to rescind all negotiations with the newly-founded puppet of Ducal Prussia.
We are in no position to decline…
Never! WE are the real successors of Prussia!

The $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$s have refused! This can only mean one thing…
We shall organize and get to them later!

No longer the masters of the regions of East and West Prussia, we are in no position to bear that eponymous name and shall henceforth be known as Brandenburg, in honor of the Margraviate of Old. Revanchist and Ultra-Nationalist Poles rejoice with unprecedented furor across the Eastern Commonwealth of Poland and Lithuania, citing their ancient motto of "If God is with us, then who is against us?"

In the $COUNTRY_ADJ$'s upper house there exists a minority of hardliners who can all agree on one thing: Germans have no place in $COUNTRY$. For this very reason they have drafted several propositions for the $MONARCHTITLE$ to review, they mostly deal with the destiny of Germans living in the nation.

In the $COUNTRY_ADJ$'s upper house there exists a minority of hardliners who can all agree on one thing: Germans have no place in $COUNTRY$. For this very reason they have drafted several propositions for the $MONARCHTITLE$ to review, they mostly deal with the destiny of Germans living in the nation. The first two propositions seek to displace all Germans living in $COUNTRY$, of which one proposes moving all of them to our Ducal Prussia puppet and the other simply proposes "tossing them over the North German border" so to speak, both shall be costly and will most likely have a diplomatic impact with German-speaking countries. The other proposes making use of our strong education system to re-educate Germans while also placing several building and property restrictions on them, again, will be costly and shall have a diplomatic impact.
Naturally we shall feed them to our vassal.
Simply throw them back where they belong.
Veto these propositions, may they never see the light of day.
After a long and arduous process, we can safely assure that $PROVINCENAME$, along with its core region, has been rid from its German population, which has been safely displaced across the border.
After a long and arduous process, we can safely assure that $PROVINCENAME$, along with its core region, has been rid from its German population, which has been safely displaced across the border.
Poland must be reborn! With Polish Lands in our hands, we must take the first step towards uniting all Polish people under a common flag… and a common house, the Habsburgs!
The ancient empire has been reborn. Let Poland-Lithuania exist once again, and let our ancient enemies tremble! All under Habsburg rule!

-Oh, how grand it could have been!- Laments a Habsburg noblesse once she hears the troubled news from Vilnius: There has been a coup d’état in Lithuania… Their aristocracy refuses to recognize what they deem a German as their Grand Duke. The stillborn hopes of union for a new Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth have crumbled as hastily as they were devised by the Habsburg Szlachta. The situation is degrading rapidly in Vilnius, where the Lithuanian Aristocracy is beginning to mobilize -whoever can wield a firearm, young or senior- in readiness for war with $COUNTRY$. \nIndeed it is a dire situation for us, but not all is lost: We can still fight against the Lithuanian Szlachta and replace them with those who are friendlier to the Polish Habsburgs… However, make no mistake: All of our possible claims in every Lithuanian Province have been lost, as their people would settle for no less than an ethnic Lithuanian on their throne, never mind if he answers to the Habsburgs.

Elements of the Lithuanian Aristocracy has performed a coup d’état when the local Habsburg-sponsored Polish nobility informed them of a new Polish-Lithuanian union, something they have deemed "abhorrent" as, by their words, "no German will ever bear the Lithuanian Crown." Both Poles and Lithuanians are already mobilizing as tensions escalate between the two nations: The Polish Habsburgs, having dropped all claims on Lithuania, demand their vassalage, and Lithuanians, rebelling against Polish Habsburg Authority, shall settle for no less than an ethnic Lithuanian on their throne.

Elements of the Lithuanian Aristocracy has performed a coup d’état when the local Habsburg-sponsored Polish nobility informed them of a new Polish-Lithuanian union, something they have deemed "abhorrent" as, by their words, "no German will ever bear the Lithuanian Crown." Both Poles and Lithuanians are already mobilizing as tensions escalate between the two nations.

Elements of the Lithuanian Aristocracy has performed a coup d’état when the local Habsburg-sponsored Polish nobility informed them of a new Polish-Lithuanian union, with both Poles and Lithuanians mobilizing as tensions escalate between the two nations.
No more pointless bloodshed. Let them go.
We will support them! Down with the Habsburgs!

The advent of nationalism has brought to Ruthenia something that was long ago taken from its people: A national identity. Recent events in Lithuania have caused an uproar in the localities of Lwów and Ternopil, which have spread to almost every territory in the $COUNTRY_ADJ$-controlled Ruthenia. Inspired by the Lithuanians, thousands of Ruthenians have begun mobilizing, demanding national recognition from the Habsburg government. However, their goals are not quite clear, so the Polish Szlachta have used this opportunity to subvert and convince the Ruthenians to reach something that has been deemed as the “Ruthenian Compromise.” A “Commonwealth” of sorts in which the country can be somewhat efficiently administrated: What it means is that the Habsburg King of Poland will also wear the crown of Ruthenia, elevating their language and customs as equal to Polish… Efficiently creating a mimicry of the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth of old. If this proposition drafted by the Polish Szlachta of Ruthenia were to be considered valid, the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Nation would be reborn into one which would obtain great irredentist claims on what is considered to be the original lands of Ruthenia. And in the case that it is repealed, we would have no other option than to either let the Ruthenians go, or worse, fight their secessionist movement.

The advent of nationalism has brought to Ruthenia something that was long ago taken from its people: A national identity. Naturally, upon the being reborn anew as the Commonwealth of Polonia-Ruthenia, the Ruthenian Szlachta have suggested annexing what it is known as "Little Ruthenia" or Malorossia, a vast expanse of land to the Southwest of Russia, governed by the ancient city of Kiev. However by formalizing these irredentist talks, we will be incurring in a serious diplomatic penalty with the neighboring Greater Powers, something Russia would not be too happy about.

Inspired by the recent events in Lithuania and Ruthenia, bands of Czech Revolutionaries have taken arms across the territories of Bohemia-Moravia, demanding the Habsburg government official recognition of their language, and among other things, a degree of autonomy for every matter concerning the Bohemian Crown. While the Habsburg Authorities have met them with harsh resistance, the movement is growing ever stronger, threatening with full secession if their demands are not swiftly met.

Widespread uprisings in the former Bohemian Crownlands are proof enough that the Czechs will not keep themselves under Austrian authority. Austria's hold on the Bohemian Lands is weakening and this threatens to upset the entire balance of power in the country as it will inevitably end in conflict for all parties involved. Many in the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government feel that it falls on us to call the powers of Europe together and negotiate a settlement that will restore some semblance of stability to the area.

Now that plans for the conference in $CAPITAL$ are underway, $COUNTRY_ADJ$ statesmen are busy trying to determine what our stance on the issue should be. Some feel we should favor relinquishing all territories of Bohemia-Moravia to the Austrians, but by assuring the Czechs that their language and customs shall be elevated to an official status within the Austrian Empire. This will most likely anger both the Czechs and Austrians nonetheless. Others believe freeing Bohemian Crownlands should be the priority -while it takes a neutral stance in all political matters- even though this might come at the expense of Austria, who will surely not be pleased.
Denying Czech freedom would be most prudent.

We have received word from the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ that they intend to hold a congress of European powers in their capital to discuss the ability of $COUNTRY$ to maintain stability in the Bohemian Crownlands. Some feel this is a veiled attempt to carve up our nation, and an insult, but regardless we cannot let the congress go on without our attendance. We shall see what manner of 'negotiation' $FROMCOUNTRY$ intends.

We have received word from the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ that they intend to hold a congress of European powers in their capital to discuss the ability of Austria to maintain stability in the Bohemian Lands. Some feel this is a veiled attempt to balk Bohemian 'aggression'. Either way, we cannot let the congress go on without our attendance. We shall see what manner of 'negotiation' $FROMCOUNTRY$ intends.

We have received word from the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ that they intend to hold a congress of European powers in their capital to discuss the ability of discuss the ability of Austria to maintain stability in the Bohemian lands. Some feel we should favor relinquishing all territories of Bohemia-Moravia to the Austrians, as not to upset the balance as much as releasing an independent Bohemia-Moravia. This can and will anger the Czech nonetheless. Others believe releasing the Bohemian Crownlands-Moravia should be the priority, even though this might come at the expense of Austria who will surely not be pleased. Still, others feel we should not take part in this veiled attempt at dismembering sovereign nations.
We will not risk our relationship with Austria for this.
The Congress of $CAPITAL$: Deny Czech Freedom.

The great powers of Europe joined together in $CAPITAL$ to negotiate the future of Bohemia-Moravia. While there was much contention, ultimately it was decided that Bohemia-Moravia were to be fully relinquished back to the Austrians, with the Czech language and customs obtaining a recognized status within the Empire. Some of the attendees were pleased and even though the Congress favored Austria, it remains to be seen whether they will bow to pressure and uphold the Congress's edict.
This is how it must be.

While there was much contention, ultimately it was decided that creating stability in the region was best even if it came at the expense of the Empire's power. The Bohemian delegates were pleased, but Austrian delegates left in a rage. It remains to be seen whether they will bow before the Congress's demands.

You shouldn't be reading this, please contact Benisman immediately.

During the Bohemian Revolution there was widespread civil unrest which often resulted in the destruction or looting of private property. Said property, however, mostly belonged to Habsburg and Austrian aristocrats, who were seen as the oppressors of the Czech people and an obstacle to the process of Bohemian-Moravian self-determination. For this reason, the Czech government decided to completely ignore this injustice and -at times- even encouraged the ravenous mobs to loot or destroy Austrian property. These actions cannot go unpunished, as the damage is estimated to be of over 28,000,000 $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Kronen or 1,200,000¤. We must demand compensation for these wrongdoings and in the event that Bohemia-Moravia refuses to pay we will have a valid casus belli to reacquire what has been lost.
Bohemia-Moravia needs to be held responsible.
We should not bother with such trivial matters.

During the Bohemian Revolution there was widespread civil unrest which often resulted in the destruction or looting of private property. Said property, however, mostly belonged to Habsburg and Austrian aristocrats, who were seen as the oppressors of the Czech people and an obstacle to the process of Bohemian-Moravian self-determination. For this reason, some hardliners and more extremist elements of the uprising encouraged the rioters to loot and even destroy Austrian property. In a complaint to the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Government, the Austrians claim that the estimated damage to be of over 28,000,000 $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ Kronen or 1,200,000¤. They are swiftly demanding compensation to these wrongdoings, and in the event that we refuse or are unable to pay reparations, they have prepared a very valid casus belli to rob us from our neutrality and –by their words- reacquire what has been lost. In any case, a senior politician also suggested asking Polonia-Lithuania for a loan, as our diplomatic missions are deeply intertwined… Whatever it is the case, we must do something.
It is only fair. §R(Pay or owe 1,200,000¤)§W
Refuse. They wouldn't go to war over some lost estates.
Bohemia-Moravia has agreed to our demands for reparations and paid the sum they owe us for the damage done to the property of Austrian nationals. The matter has been settled peacefully and amicably.

The Bohemian government refused to take any steps towards the payment of reparations to the Austrian government. In $CAPITAL$, senior government figures scramble to organize a response as the gears of war start moving. It seems like a war in Bohemia-Moravia is all but inevitable now. A Bohemian politician, acting with the condition of anonymity, suggested we ask Polonia-Ruthenia, as sponsors and enablers of the Czech, for a possible loan or even payment of said reparations. Though this is Bohemia-Moravia's last chance, as the $MONARCHTITLE$'s patience is running out.
They are not worth our time.

During the Bohemian Revolution there was widespread civil unrest which often resulted in the destruction or looting of private property. Said property, however, mostly belonged to the Austrian aristocracy, who were seen as the oppressors of the Czech people and an obstacle to the process of Bohemian-Moravian self-determination. For this reason, some hardliners and more extremist elements of the uprising encouraged the rioters to loot and even destroy Austrian property. In a complaint addressed to the Bohemian Government, the Austrians claim that the estimated damage to be of over 28,000,000 $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ Kronen or 1,200,000¤. They are swiftly demanding compensation to these wrongdoings, and in the event that the Bohemians refuse or are unable to pay reparations, the Austrians have prepared a very valid casus belli to rob them from their neutrality and –by their words- reacquire what has been lost. A senior politician also suggested asking us, Polonia-Lithuania, for a hefty loan to paid for said reparations. \n\nSome reactionary hardliners are already calling for war, while others suggest we entrap the Bohemians with their debt, What shall we do?
If it's war what our Austrian Brothers want, then so be it!
Naturally, we shall help the Bohemians, for a price…
Leave them to their fates, they're a sovereign and neutral nation after all.

Polonia-Ruthenia has agreed to our demands for reparations and paid the sum they owe us for the damage done to the property of Austrian nationals in Bohemia and Moravia. The matter has been settled peacefully and amicably.

Polonia-Ruthenia has agreed to our demands for reparations and has paid the sum we owe for the damage done to the property of Austrian nationals in Bohemia and Moravia. The matter has been settled peacefully and amicably… For them. We must now settle the matter of OUR payment to the Polono-Ruthenians. People have begun complaining that all of this has been a ruse to fall for some kind of debt slavery to the Polono-Ruthenians, while others have stated that we should simply pay off our debt in due time. Whatever the case, the Polono-Ruthenians are not too happy about it and are demanding they become our suzerains, they do make a fair point however: Our little country cannot survive in the current climate of Europe, not with all the senseless irredentism and nationalism of the German folk, many of which live in our country. We are easy prey for them!
Indeed, we should be under the protection of the Polono-Ruthenians.
Absolutely not, we shall pay them eventually.

In an unprecedented move, Bohemia-Moravia has requested we become their suzerains, as they are unable to pay off their debt to us. Citing the current political climate of Europe, they deem it necessary to be placed under the Polono-Ruthenian sphere of influence as a vassal of our nation. The Austrians are not too happy about it however.
Polonia-Ruthenia refuses to pay our debts!
Polonia-Ruthenia has refused to pay our debts citing we are a "neutral and sovereign nation"!
Polonia-Ruthenia refuses to pay the debts of Bohemia!
Polonia-Ruthenia has refused to pay the debts of Bohemia citing they are a "neutral and sovereign nation." We are free to act as we please!
Bohemia has decided to pay their debts!
Bohemia, seeing right through our ruse, has decided to pay their debts to us instead of being placed under our protection.

A recent chain of eventful occurrences have led us to the suzerainty of Bohemia-Moravia, who are now more than happy to be placed under our protection after the Austrians sought to violate their perceived neutrality as well as demanding copious sums of money in reparations for their misdeeds. Indeed now that the Bohemians do as we say, the senior Szlachta of $COUNTRY$ have devised a plan to bring the Bohemians closer to our fold: A political union in which our countries will be merged together, in the same way as the inception of the Polono-Ruthenian union. The Czech language and culture shall be elevated and promoted as another official part of our nation whilst the Crownlands of Bohemia enjoy a certain degree of autonomy -just as their Ruthenian and Polish counterparts do- as it shall be decreed on the newly-drafted Federal Constitution for our nation. But that is not everything, for once we unite with Bohemia-Moravia, we shall inherit all the rights for their territorial claims lost to the Prussians in yesteryears: The Marches of Lusatia and the Duchies of Silesia. Certainly projecting our power across the Beskids of Cieszyn and Bielsko will be no easy task, but once we retake Silesia, running our commonwealth shall be child’s play!
The Bohemian Plan - The Polono-Ruthenian Proposal

The Death of Karol II of $COUNTRY$

Horrible news have struck the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ nation: Their monarch, Karol II Stefan Habsburg-Lotarynscy, has passed away. His personal physician indicates he had a heart stroke, just like his father. The whole nation of $COUNTRY$ mourns as as it is announced that his remains shall be taken to the family crypt in $CAPITAL$… Karol II Stefan has been their longest-reigning ruler so far, and he shall always be remembered as a kind and loving father and as an avid statesman. \n\nIn other news, his son and successor Wilhelm Franciszek, shall be crowned enough.

Horrible news have struck the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ nation: Their monarch, Karol II Stefan Habsburg-Lotarynscy, has passed away. The whole nation of $COUNTRY$ mourns as as it is announced that his remains shall be taken to the family crypt in $CAPITAL$… \n\nIn other news, his son and successor Wilhelm Franciszek, shall be crowned enough.

Horrible news have struck the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ nation: Their monarch, Karol II Stefan Habsburg-Lotarynscy, has passed away. \n\nIn other news, his son and successor Wilhelm Franciszek, shall be crowned enough.
Hail the King, the King is dead!
The Coronation of Wilhelm Franciszek… Vasyl I Vyshyvanyi

In the year of our Lord $YEAR$, the young crown prince Wilhelm Franciszek has taken the throne as… Vasyl I Vyshyvanyi. Being a fluent speaker of Malorussian, or Ukrainian as he likes to call it, Wilhelm Franciszek is an avid "Ukranophile" and a very eccentric fellow. He has decided to take the regnal name of Vasyl I Vyshyvanyi, in honor of the knitted pattern displayed on traditional Malorussian folk costumes. \n\nIndeed, Vasyl I is quite the eccentric one, but he is also an avid shooter and shares an uncommon love for poetry and the peasantry… and now, he has found himself in a conundrum: How lavish shall the celebration for his coronation be?

Gold like the wheat of Ruthenia!
A simple party for the closer relatives.
The Death of Vasyl I of $COUNTRY$

Horrible news have struck our nation: Our monarch, Vasyl I Vyshyvanyi Habsburg-Lotarynscy, has passed away peacefully in his sleep. The whole nation mourns as as it is announced that his remains shall be taken to the family crypt in $CAPITAL$… Vasyl I Vyshyvanyi has been our longest-reigning ruler so far, and he shall always be remembered as an avid statesman and a friend to all Slavs.

Horrible news have struck the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ nation: Their monarch, Vasyl I Vyshyvanyi Habsburg-Lotarynscy, has passed away peacefully in his sleep.
Hail the King, the King is dead!

The Crownlands of Bohemia were severely reduced under Austrian Habsburg rule. It is high time we reclaim the old Duchies of Silesia and the Marches of Lusatia to bring them into our fold. Naturally, the Germans will complain, but it is our destiny to rule once more what was taken from us.

A party of Baltic German Aristocrats have approached the $MONARCHTITLE$ of $COUNTRY$ with quite an unusual request: The liberation of their homelands in exchange for their servitude. Ever since the rise of German nationalism, Russian authorities have decided to Russify the Baltic States by stripping the former duchies of their autonomy and enforcing the Russian language in every institution. Certainly having some allies in the Baltic Provinces could prove useful, but by even considering their request we would be openly contesting the area to the Russians. In any case, a formal declaration of war has been already drafted by our statesmen, what remains is to decide whether or not we wish to take up arms for these people.
We are in a most favorable position to unify the Baltic States, and by doing so, we shall obtain a very valuable ally in the region.

Lithuanian nobles have approached our government with quite the alluring proposition: A Federated State centered in Kaunas which will unify and rule all the Baltic Provinces and their people by enacting a parliamentary monarchy led by the Lithuanian Aristocracy, but in which every ethnicity will have its say in the parliament. \nCertainly it is a very alluring proposition, and by unifying these regions, we shall obtain a very powerful ally in a strategic location. It must be done.

The Baltic Countries must all be united as one in oder to be free from foreign interlopers. Naturally, we are in position to do so, and by adopting a federalist model of governance we shall achieve the perfect balance that is needed in order to rule a nation with many such cultures.

With the rise of Ukrainophilia as a counterculture to the long-established Malorussian identity, Vasyl I has decided to openly sponsor this movement. He has long considered himself a Ukrainophile and a Ukrainian in both body and spirit, managing to form deep bonds with the Malorussian and the Carpatho-Russian peoples of our nation.
The Malorussian Culture shall be born anew as Ukrainian!
We cannot shift the natural balance of things.
This province is experiencing cultural resurgence.

It has been long-established that Carpatho-Russians share many cultural similarities with the Malorussians, or Little Ruthenians, who form the majority of the population in the Lowlands of Ruthenia, yet, the Carpatho-Russians who live in the Carpatian Highlands are not officially accepted as a national culture in our country. It is high time to change that: For a united Ruthenia!

Ruthenia Alba, or Byelorussia, lies north of the current border with Little Ruthenia, which is currently under our domain. By declaring the Byelorussians as an integral part of our Ruthenian claims, we will have an irredentist claim on their territories and no longer will they be separated from the Malorussian brothers. For a united Ruthenia!

With the unification of Ruthenia Alba with Ruthenia Minor, we have come to notice that a great deal of Byelorussians, mostly living in the United Baltic Provinces, have been left out of their homelands. It is high time to change so: By uniting our puppet of Ducal Prussia with the United Baltic Provinces, the Lithuanian Aristocrats of the U.B.P have agreed to secede their territories where Byelorussians make the majority. For a united Ruthenia!
Securing the entrances to the Baltic Sea

The Ancient Romans had a special name for the Mediterranean Sea, they called it "Mare Nostrum", which means "Our Sea"… We too can have a "Mare Nostrum" of our own, or at least partly. By securing the entrance to the Baltic Sea we can achieve so, and what better way of doing so than unifying the Norse Realms as a $COUNTRY_ADJ$ puppet? Indeed it is a very ambitious idea, but it is doable if enough effort is put into it… However, proponents to this idea are split in two: Those who wish to take a more peaceful approach and those who wish to simply create a hegemony over the Norse by bellicose means… \n\nThe peaceful faction suggests we first encourage the formation of a customs union which will progressively unify the Nordic Realms as one, the bellicose faction simply suggests we fight the Norse and install puppet governments loyal to our own. The final voice on the matter rests on you, my $MONARCHTITLE$.
Securing the entrances to the Baltic Sea
