This has compelled many a $COUNTRY_ADJ$s to reconsider rejoining the Mexican Fatherland… while some others wish to remain independent or even rejoining at a later date since Mexico, right now, is at the brink of war with the United States! \n \n What shall we do $MONARCHTITLE$, shall we rejoin the Federal Republic?
No, Mexico is on the brink of war once more, we cannot risk it.
Yes, we must be reunited with Mexico in these trying times!
In light of the recent reinstitution of the Federal Constitution of 1824, Yucatan has decided to reunite with Mexico once more! \n \n What shall we do now, $MONARCHTITLE$?
By all means, we must welcome our Yucatecan brothers once again!
No, they're more trouble than they're worth.
Yucatan seeks union! - The Mexican Response
The $MONARCHTITLE$ of Mexico has deemed Yucatan too troublesome to be worth re-annexing.
Damn them! At least we're truly free now!

The Yucatan peninsula, in its entirety, has been swept by a secessionist movement called the Yucatan Republic, which is technically, free from the Mexican Mainland. Even though their diplomats have declared neutrality with the ongoing conflict with Mexico, we cannot spare the risk of smuggling between the nascent republic and Mexico itself. A blockade ought to be declared and the main ports of Campeche and Merida have to be seized by American forces in order to stop this threat.

American forces have sailed all the way to our ports, enacting a swift but efficient blockade on our country! This cannot stand! We are an independent republic and have nothing to do with the ongoing war between the United States and Mexico! \n \n Trade with the whole Gulf of Mexico is vital to our economy, not just with Mexico, but also with the United States. What shall we do now $MONARCHTITLE$? The people are growing weary, up to the point that some of the most radical groups in the country are suggesting annexation to the United States in order to stop any future Mexican incursions!
Send an envoy to stop the blockade immediately!
Actually… Annexation by the USA doesn't sound so bad.
Let us watch while both countries tear each other apart.
The Blockade imposed on Yucatan - The Yucatecan Response

The Republic of Yucatan has sent a diplomatic mission to $CAPITAL$ in order to deliberate and complain about the ongoing blockade on Yucatecan ports. A very heated discussion has taken place in the congress where both Conservatives and Liberals have given the Yucatecans a piece of their mind, reaching no clear consensus on current the issue. It is now up to you, Mr. $MONARCHTITLE$, to decide whether or not shall this blockade be lifted.
This could clearly thwart our war efforts in Mexico…
The Blockade imposed on Yucatan - The American Response
The $MONARCHTITLE$ and the congress of the United States have decided, after much deliberation with our diplomatic mission, to lift the blockade imposed on the Republic of Yucatan.
The Blockade imposed on Yucatan - The American Response

The $MONARCHTITLE$ and the congress of the United States have decided, after much deliberation with our diplomatic mission, to keep the blockade imposed on the Republic of Yucatan due to fears thwarting the war efforts against Mexico.
The Blockade imposed on Yucatan - The Yucatecan Response

The Republic of Yucatan has sent a diplomatic mission to $CAPITAL$ in order to deliberate and complain about the ongoing blockade on Yucatecan ports going as far as to suggest annexation of the small, nascent republic… In fact, the talks about annexation seem to have been the main reason of this diplomatic mission as talks about lifting the blockade swiftly gave an unexpected turn… Why would the Yucatecans wish for annexation? Perhaps in order to put an end to all Mexican aggressions on their economy and populace, or perhaps they have more ulterior moves. Whatever the case, a very heated discussion has taken place in the congress where both Conservatives and Liberals have given the Yucatecans a piece of their mind, reaching no clear consensus on current the issue. It is now up to you, Mr. $MONARCHTITLE$, to decide whether or not shall the United States of America annex the small Yucatecan Republic.
Clearly annexation is not the way to tackle this issue…
This could greatly benefit us in the future!
The $MONARCHTITLE$ of the $FROMCOUNTRY$ has pushed aside any offers of annexation, labelling them as foolishness.

The President of the United States of America has officially declared the annexation of the Yucatan Republic, requested by its citizens, which has now become integral part of their country as yet another state in the union.

The President of the United States of America has officially declared the annexation of the Yucatan Republic, requested by its citizens, which has now become integral part of their country as yet another state in the union.
The President of the United States of America has officially declared the annexation of the Yucatan Republic, requested by its citizens, which has now become integral part of their country.
The President of the United States of America has officially declared the annexation of the Yucatan Republic.
America Lifts the blockade on Yucatan!
After the Mexican-American war came to an end, American ships finally started to leave the Yucatan Peninsula.

In $YEAR$, three Mayan Caciques, Manuel Antonio Ay of Chichimilá, Cecilio Chi of Tepich and Jacinto Pat of Tihosuco, organized a revolt against the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government for the misdeeds committed upon them and their people since colonial times. This event became known as the “Guerra de Castas” or “Caste War”. \n \n Declaring independence from the “White Criollos”, the Mayans set up their own riotous state centered on the township of Chan Santa Cruz in Bacalar, from which they periodically launch raids into the ranchos and haciendas owned by the Criollos, going as far as killing and expelling them! They must be stopped!

In $YEAR$, three Mayan Caciques, Manuel Antonio Ay of Chichimilá, Cecilio Chi of Tepich and Jacinto Pat of Tihosuco, organized a revolt against the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government for the misdeeds committed upon them and their people since colonial times. This event became known as the “Guerra de Castas” or “Caste War”. \n \n Declaring independence from the “White Criollos”, the Mayans set up their own riotous state centered on the township of Chan Santa Cruz in Bacalar, from which they periodically launch raids into the ranchos and haciendas owned by the Criollos, going as far as killing and expelling them! They must be stopped!
We will support them! (Play as Chan Santa Cruz)
Total War in Chan Santa Cruz
The glorious revolution awaits. We must call upon all our citizens to fight, lest our cause die before it has even achieved the first step towards victory.

As the so-called Caste War rages on, we cannot help but to notice we are being overwhelmed by the savage Mayas, who keep killing our people with each province they take. Some of our top politicians cannot fathom the fact that we might lose this war… So, they have suggested the unthinkable: Asking Mexico for help. Sure it would be costly, and their ambassador has already stated that if Mexico were to truly help, Yucatan would have to become a Mexican subject once again. It surely is a hard price to pay, but the consequences of this war have put us in a truly bad spot.
We must ask Mexico for help!

As the so-called Caste War rages on in Yucatan, we cannot help but to notice the Yucatecos are being overwhelmed by the savage Mayas, who keep killing Criollos with each province they take. The situation has gotten so dire that several Yucatecan politicians have requested for Mexican aid, stating that a genocide is underway… Of course help is not free, so us, in return, requested that Yucatan should become an unincorporated territory once again, under Mexican Suzerainty, in exchange for any military and political aid.
No, they chose to be independent and they shall stay that way.
Mexico has agreed to help us! We must give up our freedom in exchange of becoming their subjects once more…
Mexico has declined to give us any aid, we are alone in this!
Mexico has agreed to help Yucatan! Thus, they've become their subjects once more…
This will not stop our rampage…
And now we must fight our common enemy, the Mayans!
Mexican Forces have managed to recapture Tepich and Tihosuco for us!
The End of the Republic of Yucatan

Several of our politicians have once again questioned our ability, or rather lack of thereof, to keep running this country. The ongoing Caste War is proof enough that we cannot defend ourselves, so we hereby have to take a very difficult decision… Shall we be reincorporated to Mexico proper?
The End of the Republic of Yucatan

Several of our politicians have once again questioned our ability, or rather lack of thereof, to keep running this country. The ongoing Caste War is proof enough that we cannot defend ourselves, so we hereby have to take a very difficult decision… Shall we be reincorporated to Mexico proper?
Yes, it is for the best.
Never! We shall keep fighting for our freedom!
The End of the Republic of Yucatan

Several Yucatecan politicians have once again questioned their ability, or rather lack of thereof, to keep running the riotous republic. The ongoing Caste War is proof enough that they cannot defend themselves, so they have taken a very difficult decision… Getting reincorporated to Mexico.

In $YEAR$, three Mayan Caciques, Manuel Antonio Ay of Chichimilá, Cecilio Chi of Tepich and Jacinto Pat of Tihosuco, organized a revolt against the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government for the misdeeds committed upon them and their people since colonial times. This event became known as the “Guerra de Castas” or “Caste War”. \n \n Declaring independence from the “White Criollos”, the Mayans set up their own riotous state centered on the township of Chan Santa Cruz in Bacalar, from which they periodically launch raids into the ranchos and haciendas owned by the Criollos, going as far as killing and expelling them, many of which have migrated into our domains, founding the township of Corozal around an old hacienda in north Belize.
A Plea to the British Empire

Our colonial neighbor in British Honduras, or Belize, has been known to support separatist movements which could benefit them one way or another, perhaps it is time to leave our differences aside and ask them for recognition as an independent nation in exchange of perhaps lowered tariffs or even preference when trading with $COUNTRY_ADJ$ merchants.
A Plea to the British Empire

Our colonial neighbor in British Honduras, or Belize, has been known to support separatist movements which could benefit them one way or another, perhaps it is time to leave our differences aside and ask them for recognition as an independent nation, as well as armaments and supplies, in exchange of perhaps lowered tariffs or even preference when trading with $COUNTRY_ADJ$ merchants.
A Plea from Chan Santa Cruz

Our new neighbors in British Honduras have been quite rowdy as of late, the so called Chan Santa Cruz, or the Cruzo'ob, have revolted against their Mexican Masters, they wish to be recognized as a free country, armaments and supplies, in exchange of lowered tariffs and preference for British Traders.
We don't have time for this.
A Plea from Chan Santa Cruz - The British Response

The British have accepted our proposition and have supplied us with guns and ammunition, as well as recognizing the sovereignty of our nation! However, the supplies are not free and we have to pay for them later on.
A Plea from Chan Santa Cruz - The British Response
The British have rejected our proposition!

For centuries the Maya peoples have been subject to invaders, now we say no more, as we are in a position of power, an irredentist cause to unite all the Mayans under one country is more than a mere possibility. Onwards to the future, the Mayans shall reclaim what rightfully belongs to them.

The recent secession in Mexico has left us a window of opportunity to obtain a new alliance, as we share common goals. We should establish proper embassies in their territories but only with the consent of its rightful owners.
Yucatan wishes to forge an alliance with us, something we could very well exploit as we share common goals against Mexico. Shall we accept?
It is not in our best interest.
$FROMCOUNTRY$ wishes to forge an alliance with us.
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has refused to forge an alliance.

Soldiers occupying $PROVINCENAME$ have begun looting and performing morally questionable acts upon the non-Mayan populace as an act of vengeance, going as far as committing rape and murder. Shall we stop them?
Our thirst for vengeance must be quenched!
We cannot lose our minds over this!
Mayan soldiers are committing atrocities across the latest province they've managed to occupy.

The Spencer-Mariscal Treaty is a proposition drafted by the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Government to the British Empire which consists in a reduction of arms trafficking to the Maya-controlled territories of Chan Santa Cruz in exchange of strengthening bilateral relations between our nations. By sending it to the British Empire, we could only hope they ratify it so the Maya hostilities in Yucatan can die down.

The $FROMCOUNTRY$s wish to ratify a proposition made to "strengthen the bilateral relations between our two nations" by reducing, or even ceasing, the supply of armaments to the Maya territories of Chan Santa Cruz. Of course we cannot simply give in and ratify the treaty, as strengthening the bilateral relations of our two nations is hardly a payoff for that. \n \n Indeed we should demand something more so we can equal the loss of our Mayan friends at Chan Santa Cruz, some of our politicians have proposed that In order to stop recognizing the Chan Santa Cruz, $COUNTRY$ needs $FROMCOUNTRY$ to renounce all claims in Belize.
It is legitimately fair that they renounce to Belize.
We cannot simply give up Chan Santa Cruz…
Simply stop funding the rebels… This is too much trouble
$FROMCOUNTRY$ wishes to ratify the treaty, but in order to do so, we must first renounce to all claims on their Belize colony.
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has refused to ratify the treaty on the grounds that they cannot simply give up Chan Santa Cruz
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has ratified the treaty and shall now stop trading and funding the Chan Santa Cruz for the goodwill of our nations.
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has renounced to all claims in Belize, it is time we stay true to our word and cut off relations with Chan Santa Cruz.
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has refused to their end of the bargain, citing that they shall never renounce to their claims in Belize.
The traitorous $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ have decided to stop their patronage to our nation in exchange of Mexico dropping all claims on Belize!
Nothing good has come from the white man!

The first main goal of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ measures must be strict segregation of the Oriental Catholic Christians from the rest of the population. In the execution of this, first of all, is the seizing of the Oriental Catholic population by the introduction of a registration order and similar appropriate measures. All rights of freedom for Oriental Catholic Christians are to be withdrawn. They are to be placed in internment camps and at the same time are to be separated according to sexes. These internment camps can be placed under the supervision of their own Oriental Catholic self-government with Oriental Catholic officials. The guarding of the boundaries between the internment camps and the outer world, is, however, the duty of the Police.\n\n§YAdds 6 points to the "slowdown" scale. Starting at 4 points, every 2 points will decrease speed by 20%.

The first main goal of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ measures must be strict segregation of the Eastern Catholic Christians from the rest of the population. All rights of freedom for Eastern Catholic Christians are to be withdrawn. They are to be placed in internment camps and at the same time are to be separated according to sexes. These internment camps can be placed under the supervision of their own Eastern Catholic self-government with Eastern Catholic officials. These internment camps can be placed under the supervision of their own Confucian self-government with Confucian officials. The guarding of the boundaries between the internment camps and the outer world, is, however, the duty of the Police.\n\n§YAdds 6 points to the "slowdown" scale. Starting at 4 points, every 2 points will decrease speed by 20%.

The first main goal of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ measures must be strict segregation of the Syro-Oriental Christians from the rest of the population. In the execution of this, first of all, is the seizing of the Syro-Oriental population by the introduction of a registration order and similar appropriate measures. All rights of freedom for Syro-Oriental Christians are to be withdrawn. They are to be placed in internment camps and at the same time are to be separated according to sexes. These internment camps can be placed under the supervision of their own Syro-Oriental self-government with Syro-Oriental officials. The guarding of the boundaries between the internment camps and the outer world, is, however, the duty of the Police.\n\n§YAdds 6 points to the "slowdown" scale. Starting at 4 points, every 2 points will decrease speed by 20%.

In the execution of this, first of all, is the seizing of the Anabaptist population by the introduction of a registration order and similar appropriate measures. All rights of freedom for Anabaptist Christians are to be withdrawn. They are to be placed in internment camps and at the same time are to be separated according to sexes. These internment camps can be placed under the supervision of their own Anabaptist self-government with Anabaptist officials. The guarding of the boundaries between the internment camps and the outer world, is, however, the duty of the Police.\n\n§YAdds 6 points to the "slowdown" scale. Starting at 4 points, every 2 points will decrease speed by 20%.

This Nation is going through Total War in order to survive.
The $COUNTRY_ADJ$ rages on and the fellow $COUNTRY_ADJ$ countrymen are gathering as many supplies as they can afford, levying troops shall be quicker and easier for a few days.

Dismantle factories and cancel all constructions and recruitments.\n\n§YNOTE: §RBecause of coding limitations this CB only works with one country at a time, if you are going to add it for more than one country then make sure to peace out separately.§W
Dismantle factories and cancel all constructions and recruitments in $STATE$
column4: Reißt Forts und Marinestützpunkte in $STATE$ ab

column2: Take a §Ycountry§W from its sovereign nation
Liberate and puppet an §Yentire country§W from its oppressors\n\n§YNOTE: §RDo not use it with normal Free people or Liberate Country CBs for other non existent countries.§W
column4: Befreit ein §Yganzes Land§W von seinen Unterdrückern

column3: Prendre $STATE$ à $RECIPIENT$ pour le rendre à $THIRD$
column6: Arrebatar el estado de $STATE$ de manos de $RECIPIENT$ y devolvérselo a $THIRD$

column2: The Russians have always been a thorn on our side, but in these times of emergency our top directives have agreed that they can become quite the useful allies in the upcoming war with our former overlords.

The East India Company has asserted their rule of India an independent state and is now at war with Great Britan. The company has restyled itself with the former Governor-General of India crowning himself as the 'Honourable Emperor of the East Indies' and has plead for our help in their endeavors against the British, what say my Tsar, shall we help these people shake off British yoke?

Realizing that the Hungarian revolutionary leaders were not willing to recognize the national rights of the Serbs, their political leaders have decided to hold an assembly on which a separate Serb Voivodeship within the Austrian Empire would be proclaimed. This assembly, dubbed the May Assembly, promulgated the creation of Serbian Vojvodina, which shall be politically free and independent from the Hungarian crown and under the suzerainty of the House of Austria, if the Austrian Emperor agrees.
We will support their cause! (Play as Vojvodina)

The question of Serbian Vojvodina remains after the defeat of the Hungarian revolution, shall the Voivodeship be annexed and divided back into its respective crownlands, or shall we stay true to our words and grant Vojvodina a degree of autonomy as a separate crownland from the Kingdom of Hungary?
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has decided to grant $COUNTRY$ its desired autonomy within the Empire!
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has decided to deny $COUNTRY$'s autonomy, demanding we submit to the Empire!
The $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ of $FROMCOUNTRY$ have decided to submit to our authority, seeking to avoid any more pointless conflicts
The $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ of $FROMCOUNTRY$ have refused to submit to our authority and have declared independence from the Empire!

The traitorous $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$s have broken their promise to grant the Serbs of Vojvodina autonomy within their Empire, thusly, our brothers have rightfully decided to revolt against their yoke. Meanwhile, in $COUNTRY$, agents from Vojvodina have petitioned the Serbian Principality for military aid, which shall be rewarded by paving the way to a future union of both nations… "It is for this very reason I believe the Serbian nation must be one and one only… Free from the yoke of any foreign interlopers who might wish to keep us apart, for Only Unity Saves the Serbs"
The Serbs of Vojvodina are beginning to mobilize.

In an unexpected outcome, the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ Emperor has let Vojvodina free. Serbs rejoice while the country's minorities complaints are overshadowed by the roaring celebrations across Vojvodina's major cities.
The foolish Serbs have decided to help Vojvodina and they've even gone as far as to request the Principality of Serbia the annexation and integration of their provinces!

The traitorous $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$s have broken their promise to grant the Serbs of Vojvodina autonomy within their Empire, thusly, our brothers have rightfully decided to revolt against their yoke, declaring themselves an independent nation.

Along the Danube on the border with the Ottomans and the Serbian and Wallachian Principalities lies the Voivodeship of Serbia and Banat. The Serbs, who aided us during the Hungarian Revolution, earned their autonomy after fighting many battles against the Hungarian Rebels… This autonomy, however, is no longer in our best interest due to several internal and external factors, such as the influence the Serbian Principality exerts on the Serbs of our nation and the ever-growing demands for autonomy for other ethnic groups within the Empire. For this reason, it has been decided that the best course of action would be the abolishment and partition of Serbian Vojvodina in its entirety, though the Serbs might object to this decision, it is ultimately our choice as their suzerains.

The Crownland of Serbian Vojvodina lies right across the border and is currently under Austrian suzerainty, this territory possesses a degree of autonomy within the empire, yet the Serbs who inhabit it are not fully satisfied with the state of their Voivodeship as it is very ethnically mixed with peoples who also wish to possess a greater degree of autonomy within the Habsburg Empire. Our brothers across the Danube lay restless feeling the calm before them storm, a storm which might very well be an ethnic, non-Serb uprising or worse, the abolition of the autonomy which cost so much to earn… This compels us to take action, to free our brethren and place them under our protection as Only Unity Saves the Serbs
With Serbian Vojvodina safely in our hands, it is only natural we begin the process of integrating its territories into the Greater $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Nation.
The Second French Intervention into Mexico

While the United States was at war with the Confederate States, Napoleon III's France instigated war against Mexico in response to President Juarez imposing a moritorium on loan interests to the French, British, and Spanish governments. British and Spanish coalition forces withdrew from the war when they discovered France's motive to create a client state in Mexico, ruled by Maximilian von Habsburg.
The Capture and Trial of Emperor Maximilian

Emperor Maximilian of the Mexican Empire has been captured by Republican forces with the help of the bribed Colonel Miguel Lopez sabotaging an attempt to escape the siege of Mexico City. Crowned heads of Europe and prominent liberals like Victor Hugo and Giuseppe Garibaldi has plead with President Juarez to spare Maximilian's life.
Mexico will not tolerate a government imposed by foreign powers. Maximilian will be sentenced to death.
The Second French Intervention has been a success!
The Mexican Empire and France have successfully defeated Republican forces.
The Second French Intervention has failed!
The Mexican Republic has successfully defeated Monarchist Forces and the Second French Empire.

The Civil War is behind us, however there is the question of the French intervening in Mexico and setting a monarchist puppet state. This is a direct violation of the Monroe Doctrine, how should we respond?
The US will not tolerate any European power intervening in the Americas. Declare War!
The US cannot afford to go into another war, send supplies.
The Mexican government are on their own.
The Confederate States intervention into Mexico.

The Empire of Mexico was an important trading partner during our fight for independence against the Northern States, helping in shipping cotton past the Yankee blockades. Should we lend a hand and create a stronger alliance with the Empire of Mexico?
Mobilize the armed forces and declare war against Mexico.
Send supplies to the Empire of Mexico.
Emperor Maximilian is on his own.
The Confederate States has intervened in Mexico!
The Confederate States has intervened in Mexico, what should we do?
Declare war against the Empire of Mexico. Mexico will not be surplanted by a monarchy.
The US declares neutrality in this conflict.
The Republican capital of Monterey has been captured by Monarchist forces!
The Republican capital of Monterey has been capture by Monarchist forces. Should we move the capital closer to the United States in El Paso de Norte?
We don't need to move the capital, we can retake Monterey back!
The Emperor of Mexico offers President Juarez and liberals to join the Empire of Mexico.
Emperor Maximilian has offered amnesty for Republican forces and President Benito Juarez the role of prime minister.
With liberals in control the Mexican Empire can be reformed.
Mexico will never accept a government ruled by foreigners!

After the Liberals ousted Santa Ana under the Plan of Ayutla, Liberals believed that the Roman Catholic Church and Mexican military were the root of Mexico's problems. Reforms suppressing the Roman Catholic Church and seperating Church and State angered the Catholic clergy and the Conservative military, leading to a coup d'etat led by Félix Zuloaga, thus beginning the Reform War.
Proceed with the Plan of Tacubaya.
Get loans and supplies from the Great Powers.
The Reform War is costing Mexico money, should we ask the Great Powers for loans and supplies? No matter who wins, the debt must be paid.
Yes, ask for aid and loans.
Let's just ask the United States instead.
Mexico has asked for aid and loans.
The Liberal government of Mexico has asked for aid and loans.
Give them supplies and a loan.

Mexico has concluded their civil war, however refused to pay back their debt after the war as was agreed on. France has proposed a treaty with other debt holders for an expedition to regain our debt, should we agree to it?
Agree to the Convention and declare war against Mexico.
We won't be a part of the expedition.

Mexico has concluded their civil war, however refused to pay back their debt after the war as was agreed on. We have the unique opportunity to set a puppet nation in Mexico and have direct access to their silver resources, we could convince other European powers to help us in an expedition as well. Should we do it?
We should establish the puppet monarch.
We won't establish a puppet monarch.
The Mexicans can pay back the loan when they can.
France has made unreasonable demands against the Mexican government and is attempting to turn Mexico into a puppet state with Maximilian as the puppet monarch, how should we respond?
Sign a treaty with Mexico and end the war.
We WILL have our money back.
The Reform War is over, should we pay back our debitors?
No, put a hold on paying back the debt.
The Reform War has ended, but we are in a stalemate.
We couldn't beat the Juarez government, however we can get help from the French. We can have our European-style monarchy.
The Reform War is over, and the Liberals have been defeated. Should we become a monarchy ruled by Maximilian or should we keep Félix Zuloaga as president?
Mexico should be ruled by Mexicans, not foreigners.
Get conservative generals of Mexico on your side.
These conservative generals of Mexico join on your behalf to fight the liberal Mexicans.
Form the Knights of the Golden Circle

The Knights of the Golden Circle advocated even before the War of Northern Aggression to annex the Golden Circle to expand the South's power. With King Maximilian on the throne of Mexico, we could form a union and greatly expand our power.

While France has restored order to the rebelliuos colony of Haiti, resistance and tension has persisted in the colony. If we were inbest heavily in Haiti, as well as extend equal rights to the Haitians and make Haiti a part of Metropolitan France, we may finally be able to calm the island's citizenry down and regain the loyalty of the haitians.

Due to the Seven Years War, the Haitian Revolt, and the sale of Louisiana by Napoleon Bonaparte, France no longer posesses it's lands in Hispaniola or New France. As the age of Imperialism begins and we look to expand our influence, the question is whether we should make a return to any of our former american colonies. Though reclaiming Haiti would be a bloody campaign, It is relatively defensless and without allies. However, if we were to reclaim New France itself we will certainly risk war with The United Kingdom, and will be gaurenteed war with the United States. While we may be able to regain some land trhough negotiations, much of these lands must be regained via war, something that will cause much internal unrest and international tension. If we are successful, restoring French America would be a major source of pride for both ourselves and our Empire, however the cost of war may be far more than the colonies are worth.
We are but one soul separated by the sea.
We will not shed French blood over a few acres of snow.
We will not bow to French Demands!
The French Canadians are more trouble than they're worth
War is our only option for reclaiming New France!
Reuniting the French Canadians was a noble dream, but it isn't worth it.

Despite early British confidence, British forces were unable to make any gains against France. The British are willing to bring an end to the war by seceding Quebec and Acadia in its entirety, however in return we would recognize British control in the rest of North America.\n\n§RNOTE: This will only give you Quebec and Acadia but NOT all of Canada, this removes the ability to go for French Lousiana.

Despite early British confidence, they have suffered a immense defeat at the hands of our armies, the French flag flies once again in Quebec and Acadia and British have agreed to secede the whole of British North America to our control. This is a glorious day for the French people!

Now that we have restored French control over Canada, we must decide on what to do with the English Settlers. Few wish to accept out rule, any some have even begun to leave Canada to resettle elsewhere. We could mandate an expulsion program to evict the settlers, however it will be costly and will earn us the ire of the United Kingdom.

The United Kingdom has denied our geneorus offer, making the peaceful aquistion of French Canada all but impossible, we could declare war on the British right now, or we could abandon the dream of reuniting the French Canadiens and avoid a costly war.

The United Kingdom has agreed to our demands, and they have offered to handover the French-speaking parts of Canada in return for a hefty sum of money. While perhaps more than what French Canada is worth, It is far lower than the cost of a drawn out war with the UK.

Despite our best efforts, French armies once again occupy much of Spain. It seems there is little choice but to surrender to the French and allow them to dictate terms. If they are kind, they will simply force us to admit defeat, or possibly annex some of our colonial possessions. If they are unkind, they may force us to give up territory in our homeland -- though doing so will surely bring about the wrath of the European powers.

The French Army has consolidated their control over Madrid and proven their superiority in the war, and thus the Spanish government has little choice but to accept any terms we dictate. The European powers are pushing for peace and conciliation -- they wish to see that France only recieves minor concessions -- though if we dare risk their wrath we could certainly wrest territorial considerations, both Overseas and in Iberia itself.

Despite our best efforts, French armies once again occupy much of Spain. It seems there is little choice but to surrender to the French and allow them to dictate terms. If they are kind, they will simply force us to admit defeat, or possibly annex some of our colonial possessions. If they are unkind, they may force us to give up territory in our homeland -- though doing so will surely bring about the wrath of the European powers.

The French Army has consolidated their control over Madrid and proven their superiority in the war, and thus the Spanish government has little choice but to accept any terms we dictate. The European powers are pushing for peace and conciliation -- they wish to see that France only recieves minor concessions -- though if we dare risk their wrath we could certainly wrest territorial considerations, both Overseas and in Iberia itself.

The institution of a revolutionary regime in France in led most of the European monarchies to form coalitions against it. However, The military successes of the armies of the First Republic resulted in a considerable expansion of the national territory all the way to the left bank of the Rhine. While Napoleon Bonaparte would continue French conquests, His eventual defeat would lead France to be stripped of it's new territory by the Congress of Vienna in 1815. The prospect of reclaiming France's natural borders, however, remained popular to many people both within the government and France itself. Despite it's cost in French blood and iron, We have finally reclaimed France's Natural Borders. While German Nationalism and the rebellious Flemish and Dutch may upset the fragile peace, for now France has proven itself to be the True master of Europe!

In 1838 Jean François Langlois, commander of the whaling ship Cachalot, embarked on a grandiose scheme for a French colony at Akaroa. After a dubious land purchase from Maori he established the Nanto-Bordelaise Company in France to carry out the projec, and In 1839, King Louis-Philippe agreed to provide assistance. The French representative for the settlement, Captain Charles François Lavaud, sailed for New Zealand in April 1840. A month later, the ship Comte de Paris set off for Akaroa carrying 53 emigrants. The French scheme sparked debate in England and France, and bowing to pressure to colonise the country, the British government sent out William Hobson in 1839. He signed the Treaty of Waitangi on 6 February 1840, and claimed sovereignty over the South Island on 17 June.

The French government has refused to recognize the Treaty of Waitangi. Rumors of planned French colonization attempts are spreading and our government is currently debating the best course of action to take.
The United Kingdom has ignored our complaints, and maintain that the Treaty of Waitangi is valid.
The United Kingdom has backed down, leaving  New Zealand open to French colonization.
The United Kingdom maintains that the Treaty of Waitangi is valid, however they have offered to sell the islands of Australasia to us for a hefty sum.

The Americans have been beaten. French troops control all key cities on the Eastern Seaboard as well as the American capital, giving the US no choice but to negotiate a treaty with us. We intend to demand the return of Colonial Louisiane, the cession of Maine down to the Kennebec River, and the revocation of any claim to said territories. For fair compensation, we promise the Americans a large sum of money as well as the Anglo-dominated portions of Upper Canada, as well as revoking any claim we have to the Ohio river valley.

French Louisiana was an administrative district of New France. Under French control 1682 to 1762 and 1802 (nominally) to 1803, the area was named in honor of King Louis XIV, by French explorer Rene-Robert Cavelier, Sieur de la Salle. While France lost the territory during the Seven Years' War, France regained sovereignty of the western territory in the secret Treaty of San Ildefonso of 1800. But strained by obligations in Europe, Napoleon Bonaparte decided to sell the territory to the United States in the Louisiana Purchase of 1803, ending France's presence in Louisiana.\n\nAttempting to reconquer the vast territory of Louisana will be a mounmental task...

French Guiana has long been a colony of our nation, however debates over Guiana's future is splitting opinions within our government. While some argue that French Guyana should remain a French Colonial possesion, Others propoes that we could fully integrate French Guyana as a part of Metropolitan France.

Acadia was a colony of New France in northeastern North America that included parts of eastern Quebec, the Maritime provinces, and Maine to the Kennebec River. Slowly annexed by the United Kingdom over the course of the 18th century, Acadia is once again in French hands. If we intend to keep Acadia this time, we must invest in the colony, funding new settlers, deportation of rebellious english colonials, and building infrastructure throughout the colony. If we are successful, we will have a far greater control over Canada and the North American coast.

Canada was the name of the French colony that once stretched along the St. Lawrence River, with the other colonies of New France being Acadia, Louisiana and the south shore of Newfoundland. Originally lost to the United Kingdom in 1763, we have now since restored out control over Canada. If we wish to counter possible rebellion by the Anglo-Canadians or invasion by the Americans, we must invest heavily in Canada, ensuring that the colony has a strong french presence and an unbroken loyalty to France.

Sold to America in 1803 by Napoleon Bonaparte, we have reclaimed out former colony from the Americans. Ministers within the government have suggested sending French settlers to Louisiana, to settle the colony to properly consolidate our rule once more in the new world.

Much like New Zealand, we have recieved Australia in our deal with the British. While a relatively minor colony, French colonial expeditions to Australia could be an important step in gaining a foothold in Southeast Asia and The Pacific.

Originally annexed from Napoleonic Spain by France in 1812, It would be easy to take advantage of Spain's weakened state. While the other Greater Powers will protest, Annexing Catalonia will put us one step closer to restoring the territory of the 1st French Empire.

Ever since it's liberation from the British, Canada has remained a quiet part of our Empire. It's low population, combined with the relatively isolated position has led to little change. As the British slowly parition their empire into dominions, the French-Canadian memebers of the national government have begun to question Canada's role in the French empire. Due to it's colonial status, two paths are open for Canada. Either we can create a French-Canadian dominion in the style of the British, or we could integrate Canada into metropolitan France itself. Similar successes in French Guiana has shown that distance is a non-issue. And as White, French speaking Catholics, Canada will be far easier to integrate compared to the Algerian departments. If we are to do this, we must act fast, and integrate Canada before any sort of French-Canadien nationalism can arise.

One of the most remote parts of our Empire, Nouvelle-Zelande (or New Zealand) fell under French control following a standoff between the UK and France in the 1840s. Since then, France has slowly settled the island, though it's remoteness and low population mean that it has yet to develop a truly seperate national idenitity. While granting more autonomy to New Zealand is always an option, we can also take advantage of this situation and integrate New Zealand into France itself, Similarly to nearby New Caledonia.

One of the more remote parts of our Empire, Australia fell under French control following a standoff between the UK and France in the 1840s. Since then, France has slowly settled the island, though it's remoteness and low population mean that it has yet to develop a truly seperate national idenitity. While granting more autonomy to Australia is always an option, we can also take advantage of this situation and integrate New Zealand into France itself, similarly to nearby New Caledonia.

Ever since it's reconquest from the United States, Louisiane has been a relatively peaceful colony. But as France turns to focus on colonial exploits in Africa and Asia, the question arises on what to do with out colonies in North America. Louisiane was primarily settled in the 1840s by French settlers from France, and as such it still maintains strong ties to the Motherland. If we wish to avoid our empire fracturing like that of the Spanish or the English, we should take steps towards integrating Louisiane into Metropolitan France.

The Aosta Valley was the first government authority to adopt Modern French as working language in 1536, three years before France itself. French has been the official language of the Aosta Valley since 1561, and in the 1860s, over 90% of the population declared being Francophone. In addition to our claims on Savoy and Nice, we will also extend our claims to the Aosta Valley as well.

Our attempts at settling Algeria peacefully with Frenchmen, therefore overwheling the natives,have failed. If we are to make Algeria a core part of France, then much more drastic methods must be introduced. The reactionaires propose a harsh system of oppression, forced emigration, systematic relocations, and even execution by the military if the locals refuse to follow orders. At the same time, we will offer large incentives for french families to settle in Algeria, to increase the Pied-Noir population. While the Liberals in France will be shocked and appalled, this is a neccesary action.

Giving citizenship and earninbg the loyalty of the native Algerians will not be enough to make Algeria French. If we truly want to establish ourselves in North Africa, we must send European French settlers to Algeria as well

Reclaiming Quebec and British controlled Acadia will be our first major goal of reuniting the overseas French. However, before we resort to all-out warfare to reclaim our former American colonies, we must try our hand at diplomacy first - if we offer a large sum of money, as well as agreeing to ignore British 'goals' elsewhere, we may be able to regain Quebec without a war.

Now that the British have backed down, New Zealand is open to French Colonization. French Names are to be given to local areas, and the administration is to be re-organized, and the first group of government funded settlers will set up the colonial administration. While there have been concerns that the native Maori will be a problem, the Military has been dispatched to forcibly pacify the natives and enforce French rule over the Islands. A nation-wide propaganda campaign will be organized to attract settlers to the Islands, to avoid the low population problems that French Lousiana and New France suffered from, however the effectiveness of these policies will remain to be seen.

Our recent annexation of Wallonia has not gone as smoothly as planned. Small cultural differences are present, and the Walloon-ran local government resists our attempts to centralize power. If we were to grant Wallonia a degree of autonomy (which may be revoked later), we will be able to quell any unrest and work towards fully adding Wallonia into the French Nation.

While Germany has only been unified for a short amount of time, it has spent much of it's short history fighting the French government over Elsaß-Lothringen. Even now, France continues to oppress the Germans living there. If we are to ensure German superiority, we must remove the French menace once and for all...

While our invasion of France has been a success, the costs of occupation, in both manpower and resources, is unsustainable in the long run. If we want to continue our pacification of France, we should create a puppet state in the south as a legal continuation of the French Government, however under our stict jurisdiction. Northern France. and France's colonies, will remain German possesions.

While France is certainly more united compared to it's German or Italian neighbors, the fact remains that large amounts of French-cultured people reside outside of France's borders. The Swiss people in Romandie, The Walloons in the low countries, and even the French-Canadians in Quebec, are all French at heart. If we were to encourage French pan-nationalism, both here and abroad, we may be able to one day re-unite the French peoples of the world under a single French flag.

With the Rhineland back under French control, The question has been raised as to what to do with the new "French" subjects. Despite the German nature of the West Bank, The Rhinelanders had not been enemies of Revolutionairy France, unlike the Spaniards or Portuguese. Prussia, even after their incorporation of the Rhineland and Westphalia in 1815, were regarded by the Rhinelanders with more suspicion, due to their Francophile feeling. The incorporation of such a large number of non-French citizens has also brought up France's cultural diversity in other areas of the Empire, such as in Algeria or Flanders. Some of the more conservative politicians call for a purely French state, united in one language and culture. The Liberals, however, call for granting the Rhinelanders autonomy similar to that of the Walloons. While Autonomy will seriously hinder our assimilation efforts, it may reduce unrest in the Rhineland and prevent giving the Germans reason to intervene.

French rule over the Rhineland has been firmly cemented in the last 15 years. The Rhenish autonomy laws, as well as the cultural exchange between the Rhineland and the rest of France, has finally earned the loyalty of the Rhenish people. As elements of French culture are merged with that of German culture, the Rhineland, while far more diverse than the rest of European France, is slowly but surely becoming an integral part of our nation.
We shall recognize the British claims.
The UK must negotiate with us directly if they want us to drop our claims.

Talks by senior officials in $CAPITAL$ have come to an end, with the suggestion for the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government to found a $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Niger Company being the main course of action recommended. With the intensification of colonial competition in the wake of the African Conference, the foothold in Southern Niger that the company can provide can greatly help expanding $COUNTRY_ADJ$ in the Niger delta. All that is missing is the initial capital for the company.

The Pact of Umar is a 7th century treaty between the Muslims and the Christians of Syria, Mesopotamia, or Jerusalem that later gained a canonical status in Islamic jurisprudence. In general, the pact contains a list of rights and restrictions on non-Muslims (dhimmis). By abiding by them, non-Muslims are granted the security of their persons, their families, and their possessions. Under the pact today, all dhimmis have their religion and status protected - they are free to practice and need not to convert and in return, they pay a tax: the jizya. Abolishing the pact means relinquishing this tax but will enable efforts to convert the non-muslims. It's a path without return which will greatly anger other countries as well as our own dhimmi population.
The time has come to align ourselves to our new masters.

One of the long standing problems for shipping on the Far Eastern and India trades has always been the need to round the African Cape in order to actually get there. By establishing a canal through the Suez, we will shorten the journey to Asia by days, as well as perform a wonderful feat of modern engineering. §RThis feat, however, is estimated to cost between least 1 and 3 million pounds.§W

Building a canal between the Baltic and the North Sea would be a tremendous boon to our shipping, and we are in a position to build one in Kiel. The Kiel Canal and the Danish islands, with their numerous tortuous channels, will enable $COUNTRY$ to play the game of hide-and-seek with a strong naval opponent, such as the Royal Navy. Besides, it will greatly strengthen $COUNTRY$'s position in the Baltic. Whereas Russia must send her ships through the Skager Rack and Kattegat, $COUNTRY$ can pass them quickly and safely through the Canal. Last, but not least, the Canal will convert the Baltic and the North Sea into a single sea as far as $COUNTRY$ goes. Kiel is an enormous harbour, but it lays on the Baltic, while Wilhelmshaven on the North Sea is too small. §RThe estimated costs are between 0.5 to 1.5 million pounds.§W

Proposals for a Canal across the Panama Isthmus probably date back to the first discovery of the area. Nowhere is the strip of land that unites the North and South American continents thinner than here, and, with the aid of modern engineering, we could shorten the travel time between the Atlantic and the Pacific by several days by building it. §RThe construction will take a long while, however, and cost between 2 and 6 million pounds.§W
The Decrees of $YEAR$ on Algerian Cotton

In the context of the a strong demand in Cotton, the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government in $CAPITAL$ decided to pass a series of decrees stimulating cotton growing in Algiers. These decrees stipulate the obligation for the State to buy, for three years, from $YEAR$, all the cotton crops of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ planters, at a price fixed in advance, while the world prices are high. The other axis of action fixed by these decrees consisted in attributing, for another two years, export premiums in $COUNTRY$ for cottons harvested in Algeria.
Economic Reform in the Comoro Islands

The Comoro Islands are an archipelago of Volcanic islands near Madagascar, largely inhabited by Muslims. Agriculture there is geared towards the basic necessities of the inhabitants, but now under $COUNTRY_ADJ$ rule that is unnecessary. Opening up the islands to $COUNTRY_ADJ$ investment will lead to new cash crops and new goods being produced by natives with $COUNTRY_ADJ$ money - something that is of great interest in $CAPITAL$.
Pay Respects to a Great Power

If we ever hope to safeguard our nation against foreign aggression, we must find allies in the world. Powerful allies. Great Powers. By sending an entourage with typical $COUNTRY_ADJ$ gifts, compliments and pleasantries to a great power, we will be able to curry some favour with them - and they can become a key ally in the future of $COUNTRY$.

The Congo Free State was confirmed as the personal property of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ $MONARCHTITLE$, thus it is only fair and reasonable that we now explore the region, and perhaps leave a bit of a personal mark on it?

$COUNTRY$ does not need a standing navy. When the time comes, we can build some ships, conscript merchant and fishing ships and fit them with guns. That time came again, and it's time for the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ people to step up and protect their country.

Old HPM standard was to unlock crisis as soon as someone researched Revolution & Counter-revolution. This changed in recent versions to wait until 1886 at least, to avoid Great Wars during the scramble for Africa. If you prefer the old rule, this option will change this system back to that.
Eisenstadt is part of Austria proper - and shall be once more.
Call a Convention on the South Tirol Question

South Tirol is traditionally split as majority German in the North and majority Italian in the South, with minorities on both provinces. This has been a great source of attrition with our German neighbours, one that some in $CAPITAL$ are eager to solve. We can invite our neighbours to a convention aimed at finding solutions to this problem - though the convention does not guarantee a result, this is the best chance we have of solving this matter peacefully.
Canada is under our dominion, and the French Canadians are again part of $COUNTRY$. They should be put in positions of power in Canada, in order to expunge Anglo influence in Canada.

“He who wants to persuade should put his trust not in the right argument, but in the right word. The power of sound has always been greater than the power of sense.”\nA meeting in $CAPITAL$ with senior figures of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government proposed a propaganda effort to boost popular support to the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government's efforts. We can choose to boost our war efforts or strengthen the government. There are no guaranteed results, however, as our marketing might fail and even backfire. Unless, of course, the press is controlled by the state...
This removes the flag once peace is achieved. Used to be an event.

Supreme executive power in the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ state emanates from $CAPITAL$, through the figure of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ monarch. The absolute monarch is the final authority in all matters of the state, but the bureaucracy and the military are the pillars that sustain the absolutist government. In addition, the landed aristocracy, which often acts as the bureaucracy, expects and receives positions of power in the government, positions appointed by the monarch. This is necessary for the normal function of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ state - the aristocrats are the governor generals, the privy-councillors, the high-ranking bureaucrats, the ministers, the judges and the executors of the monarch's decisions. For these functions, several government institutions exist and are populated by the landed nobility - the Committee of Ministers of $COUNTRY$, the Governing Senate, the State Council. They help draft and apply laws, manage foreign and internal policy, plan wars and administer the military, advise the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ monarch as well as judge and administer justice. The monarch still can and has the final say in all these matters, and is his royal prerogative to do away the currently appointed aristocrats and pick new ones. By taking this step - effectively dissolving the upper house and appointing new ministers - the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ monarch can surround himself with sycophants and petty nobility that are willing to do whatever he wants them to do - for a time, at least. This break in the unspoken agreement between the monarch and the bureaucrats, the monarch and the aristocracy, will bring consequences - besides exposing internal fractures in the government to the international community, it is sure to anger the nobles and sow confusion throughout the government ranks.

§W"The first main goal of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ measures must be strict segregation of the people from the §YAfrican Diaspora - that is, the Afro-American, Afro-Caribbean, Afro-Latinos, Afro-Brazilians, Afro-Antillean and Kreol §W- from the rest of the population. Too much international attention has been drawn to $CAPITAL$ due to Directive No. 1. The $COUNTRY_ADJ$ $MONARCHTITLE$ decided that it's time to dismantle the apparatus  that facilitated the Directive, in order to cast aside any international doubt over the integrity of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government. After this, rebuilding such infrastructure back could take a while.

Directives for the prosecution of offences committed against the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ State

Within our nation's territories, elements hostile to $COUNTRY$ have increased their efforts against the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ State. The amount and the danger of these machinations oblige us to take severe measures as a determent. First of all the following directives are to be applied:
I. Within the occupied territories, the adequate punishment for offences committed against the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ State or the occupying power which endanger their security or a state of readiness is on principle the death penalty.
II. The offences listed in paragraph I as a rule are to be dealt with in the occupied countries only if it is probable that sentence of death will be passed upon the offender, at least the principal offender, and if the trial and the execution can be completed in a very short time.
III. Prisoners are subjected to military procedure only if particular military interests require this. In case $COUNTRY_ADJ$ or foreign authorities inquire about such prisoners, they are to be told that they were arrested, but that the proceedings do not allow any further information.
IV. Commanders and the Court authorities within the framework of their jurisdiction, are personally responsible for the observance of this decree.
V. The Chief of the High Command of the Armed Forces determines in which occupied territories this decree is to be applied. He is authorized to explain and to issue executive orders and supplements. The $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Minister of Justice will issue executive orders within his own jurisdiction.

The island of Daemado, known by the Japanese as Tsushima, has since ancient times been part of Korea, despite the occupation by foreign Japanese forces. It's time we rectify this and claim the island for the glory of Korea!

While the Métis initially developed as the mixed-race descendants of early unions between First Nations and colonial-era European settlers, within generations (particularly in central and western Canada), a distinct Métis culture developed. Integrating these people close to Canada will allow us to squash national dreams as they become more and more Canadian.

The French Indian Ocean Territory is known for several names - Reunion Island, Bourbon Island, Bonaparte Island. But now it is the time to give it a more appropriate name - one more in line with the current French government.
Greek Supremacy in the Ionian Islands
There has been a shift in the political balance and the Ionian islands now have a policy of Greek supremacy.
With the recent enclave in Galicia-Lodomeria formed, we have no option but to grant them greater autonomy to rule themselves.

The sheikhs of Kuwait have long come to $CAPITAL$ to pay their respects to the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Sultan. This suzerainty was, for the most part, informal and de jure. But in recent years the relations between the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government and Kuwait got closer and that suzerainty became a de facto reality. Now it is the time to take the final step and integrate Kuwait fully in the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ bureaucracy. The sheikhs of Kuwait will continue to live in Kuwait and will hold some small power in local politics, but all decisions and should and will come from $CAPITAL$.

From the Tigris to the Mediterranean, the Syrian desert is a vast landscape of of desert, semidesert and barren wastelands home to nomadic and seminomadic pastoralists. $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government claims authority through much of the area, but our claims are just that - the nomadic population recognizes no authority. Senior figures in $CAPITAL$ have come up with plans to establish several military bases in the areas we claim, thus enforcing an effective occupation of the desert. Such a move, however, will likely be mirrored by any nations with a stake in the Syrian wastelands.

Belgrade has historically been the capital of Serbia. Now that the Ottoman garrison left the city, it would be auspicious to move our nation's capital to our old historical capital, as a showcase of our newly found independence.
We are not at war anymore, the focus is useless.
Will we survive the foreign onslaught?

The Haussmann Plan was a project for the modernization and urban renewal of Paris, carried out between 1852 and 1870. The project was initiated after a period of rapid urban growth and development, as the old city centre of Paris had proven itself incapable of meeting the infrastructure demands of a growing city. The long, open boulevards championed by Hausmann have remained defining characteristics of Paris' street layout ever since. The reforms are estimated to cost §R50,000¤§W paid now or in instalments.

The $COUNTRY_ADJ$ made several mistakes when dealing with the Flemish. The Protestant/Catholic divide and political ostracization, among other things, led to the Belgian Revolution. It's time we try and repair our relationship, implement effective freedom of religion and give them equal rights. Bowing down to them will dent our international prestige, but it will allow us to live in peace once again.
To fulfil the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ ambitions of an Indochinese colony, senior figures in $CAPITAL$ concocted a plan to justify and declare a protectorate over Vietnam. Now, we can put that plan into motion.

With the end of the Austrian-led customs union known as German Confederation and the rise of a modern, intertwined German state, the duchy of Limburg became an outdated promise - one that was part of the defunct German Confederation. Limburg is internationally recognized as an integral part of the Netherlands but as the Germans set their eyes and ambitions on the complete unification of all German Confederation states, the duchy became a dangerous compromise. Several senior figures in $CAPITAL$ are preparing an order for the $MONARCHTITLE$ to sign, declaring the extinction of the old duchy of Limburg and its full integration in the Netherlands. The Germans, however, might try to protest this move.

The Ostend Manifesto proposes that the island of Cuba should be annexed to the United States as a slave state, to balance the expected influx of new free-states in the West. By supporting the manifesto, we can calm tension over the slavery issue domestically, but it might reduce our standing with the European Great Powers significantly. The Manifesto also proposes a shift in foreign policy, justifying the use of force to seize Cuba in the name of national security in case its owners are not willing to sell it to us.
Revoke the Back to Africa Act
We can revoke the 'Back to Africa Act' but dismantling the structure built around it will mean that any efforts to re-instate it will take a while.

The $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Colonization Society was an early advocate of the idea of resettling $COUNTRY_ADJ$-born blacks in Africa. Founded in 1816, it was composed of two core groups: abolitionists and slave owners. Abolitionist members believed in freeing African slaves, along with their descendants, and providing them with the opportunity to return to Africa. Slave owning members believed free blacks endangered the system of slavery and sought to expel them from $COUNTRY$. Their efforts were ultimately fruitless as they didn't attract a significant numbers of colonizers. With the support of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government, however, resettling won't be optional. By signing the "Back to Africa Act" we can fulfil their purpose, this time through the forceful repatriation of the Afro-$COUNTRY_ADJ$ community in our core territories. It won't be fast and it will attract a lot of negative attention from around the international community, but we can continue on the work of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Colonization Society in repatriating the African diaspora in $COUNTRY$.
Revoke the Back to Africa Act
We can revoke the 'Back to Africa Act' but dismantling the structure built around it will mean that any efforts to re-instate it will take a while.

With the recent defeat of a colonial power, our claims to one of our colonies they own are once again at the spotlight. The international community at large agrees that these colonies should be returned to the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government - we just need to take the necessary steps to get them back.
Our former overlords were defeated and we earned our freedom. Hurrah!

The $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Government announced the reformation of the land taxation system in $YEAR$ as part of the Daijokan Ordinances in Japan. The government initially ordered individual farmers to measure the plots of their land themselves, calculate their taxes, and submit the results to local tax officials. However, difficulties arose with the honesty of the measuring system when the budget showed that collected taxes fell far below projected values. Private land ownership was recognized for the first time in Japan with the issuing of land titles. The previous practice of land ownership was the Public Land Public Citizen Laws, which stated that all land was under the sole ownership of the emperor, such that individual farmers were merely borrowing the land from feudal lords, who in turn were borrowing the land from the emperor. The reform abolished this archaic system of land ownership, and began to allow landowners to use their property as a financial asset in collateral or other investment. This law was one of the first steps towards the development of capitalism in Japan, paralleling the English statute Quia Emptores enacted several centuries earlier.

India is becoming too big and too troublesome to keep as a direct colony. In $CAPITAL$ a few key ministers proposed that we grant them home rule to placate Indian nationalism - while some local Indian rulers asked not to be integrated in India and continue under the protection of $COUNTRY$.

Despite our shared cultural ties, Malta has been a separate entity and dominated by British interests for a long time. Now that we own the island, we can start integration the process to make the Maltese an integral part of the great Italian nation.
Now that Rhodesia/Zimbabwe and South Africa are independent, so should be Botswana.
Our beloved homeland grows as more historical territories come back in our hands. We can't have it under colonial status - $COUNTRY$ territory will never be a colony.

There has been talk in the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ academia about uniting with our brothers in a greater country, forfeiting our independence in favour of a pan-nationalistic union. We have proved, however, that we are just fine on our own and that the destiny of $COUNTRY$ does not lie with other countries. To solidify this notion, several ministers in $CAPITAL$ have proposed a new curriculum to our education system, as well as a series of pieces in the media, that will help make the dreams of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ people being part of a pan-nationalistic union a distant dream.
The occupation of the Congo is almost all done, with a few pockets of resistance left.

This decision will show the "government decisions", decisions that are not commonly used and can be hidden to avoid clutter. These are:
-Renovate the Academia
-Enslave the Serfs
-Turn Off Vassal Contribution Payments
-Enable 'Return Cores' Decisions
-Enable 'Release Vassals' decisions
-Reform the Colonial Army
-Increase Conscription Time
-Reform the Local Government (Change a tag that doesn't exist and that you own their capital to have the same reforms)
-Choose a Trade Policy
-Direct No 1
 Dissolve the Upper House
Start a Propaganda Campaign

This option will hide the following decisions:
-Renovate the Academia
-Enslave the Serfs
-Turn Off Vassal Contribution Payments
-Enable 'Return Cores' Decisions
-Enable 'Release Vassals' decisions
-Reform the Colonial Army
-Increase Conscription Time
-Reform the Local Government (Change a tag that doesn't exist and that you own their capital to have the same reforms)
-Choose a Trade Policy
-Direct No 1
 Dissolve the Upper House
Start a Propaganda Campaign
The decisions to organize colonial nations are hidden to unclutter the decisions tab.
Hide the decisions to organize colonial nations.

Thorough the Renaissance and partly due to the Italian merchant republics great influence, the Italian people spread through parts of the Mediterranean and the Balkans. In the era of nationalism, however, these people are treated as second-class citizens or are looked upon with distrust. There have been calls, both in Italy as well as from Italians abroad, to extend Italian influence in these lands and safeguard the Italian people.
Our previous measures were not enough.
The situation with $COUNTRY$'s finances has been resolved... for now.
We must impose stringent measures to handle our economic crisis.
Ever since we gained more territory, the international zone in our country has been less and less recognize. A congress of the Great Powers now has removed out international zone status.

The small North Sea island of Heligoland had become a British possession during the Napoleonic Wars, ceded formally by Denmark in the 1814 Treaty of Kiel. After the Unification of Germany the island became an object of desire for $COUNTRY$, as the few inhabitants of the Island were by and large Germans. Now with it firmly in our hands, no one can deny our claims to Heligoland.

In 1857 Helmuth von Moltke was appointed Chief of the Prussian General Staff, which he soon set about reforming. Among the ideas implemented by von Moltke were a department for historical studies, extensive wargaming exercises and a special department dedicated to cataloguing and studying the telegraph and railway networks of Prussia, and how they could be used to best effect in the event of war. The end result was that, by the time of the Franco-Prussian war, Prussia's General Staff was considered the most efficient in Europe, its methods soon becoming widely studied and adopted abroad. Moltke remained Chief of the Prussian Staff for the next 30 years, and is known as one of the most brilliant military strategists of the 19th century.

The trade policy decisions helps the AI save more money and help historically heavily protectionist countries (like the US, Russia) to do what they did historically and levy heavy tariffs on imports. They happen once every 10 years (sometimes they are rescinded earlier though) and the AI has full autonomy to pick one of the several choices (so no behaviour is guaranteed). If you'd like to disable this for some reason, you can do it with this option.

By default, province names use the English name if one exists. If you'd rather have names always be localized, this option will do this. Names will use the modern country language or the cultural majority. Preferably, both will be the same. This option is under construction and not finished, so if you have suggestions, I will add them.

Our new colonies would serve us much better if the natives gave up on subsistence farming. Through a series of investments destined to companies and private persons, we can nudge in our colonies production in a direct that suits us better.
We have several coal mines in our country that produce superior bituminous coal, lasting longer and producing more heat. Exploiting them will increase our coal production.

The discovery of man-made synthetic dyes in the mid-19th century triggered a long decline in the large-scale market for natural dyes. Synthetic dyes, which can be produced in large quantities, quickly superseded natural dyes for the commercial textile production enabled by the industrial revolution, and unlike natural dyes, are suitable for the synthetic fibres that followed. In a few of our provinces, the production of natural dyes is in a steady decline for a few years and now producers can barely sell their product. Faced with bankruptcy, most dye producers are looking for new goods to sell. We can help them look for new markets.
Our overlord issued an order allowing us to cease any contribution to their offers.
Exempt Vassals from Contributing to our Treasury

Our coffers are full enough and members of the cabinet have put forward the proposal of exempting our vassals, not the substates, from contributing to $COUNTRY$'s treasury. This tax break would boost our relations with them in the short term, but wouldn't benefit our finances in any way.
Oblige Vassals to Contribute to our Treasury
The earlier tax break offered to vassals has run its course. We need that every vassal of $COUNTRY$ to do their part and contribute to the maintenance of $COUNTRY_ADJ$ glory.

While the ruling party has its own broad trade policy, there are several schools of economic thought competing competing for space in the government. Adopting a trade policy will take away some of the flexibility in setting tariffs, but it will allow for more efficient tariff collection and possibly other benefits over what a volatile tariff police might have. 


§YNOTE: Researching Market Regulations will unlock more options when this decision is taken. You can disable this decision entirely and for the rest of the game by taking it and choosing the last option in the fired event.§W
Our trade policy, or our neighbour's, no longer correspond to the ruling party wishes.

Too much blood has been shed over Antofagasta and now the nations involved are willing to sit on the table and discuss the issue. With international help and arbitration, we drafted a proposal offering a §R60,000¤§W sum as indemnification payment to all parties involved, paid in instalments thought the next years and with each part getting half of the total sum. In return they will abandon their claims over Antofagasta. Any territories we might hold from the involved parties that are not claimed by $COUNTRY$ will be returned to their rightful owners and any claims we have in regions other than Antofagasta will be put to international arbitration.

After being destroyed by a fire in 1624, during the reign of King Christian IV, the city then known as Oslo was moved closer to Akershus Fortress and renamed Christiania in the king's honour. As the years passed many in the government feel the original name, derived from the Old Norse, would be a much better name to represent the city's legacy than the name of an old monarch.
The success of the latest uprising means the recognition of Poland as a free, sovereign state. Our days of being subjected to foreign powers are over.
Call for a Convention Over the Danish Straits

The Sound Dues (toll) was introduced by King Eric of Pomerania in 1429 and remains in effect to this day. A toll on all the trade passing through the Danish straits, these barriers damage our commerce in the region. We can call a Convention to solve this situation once and for all, if we have the money to pay the proper indemnifications and to act as a guarantor that this money will be paid.
They refused to abolish the tolls on the Danish straits, but now they have no choice. We have the power to end their choke-hold on the Baltic sea.

The provinces of Corrientes and Entre-Rios long have been close. Now, with the rebellion of Corrientes and our conquest of the province, the governor of Entre Rios made several political moves that brought the province under his influence.

We are a de facto independent country, despite what other countries might think. We now have the clout to assert this independence once and for all, to be recognized as a full sovereign nation where no other nations have claims on.
As vassals, we are forced to contribute to our overlord coffers.
The $YEAR$ Expedition to the Arab Gulf

The $COUNTRY_ADJ$ governor in Baghdad came to $CAPITAL$ to request military provisions and soldiers to outfit an expedition to deal with Wahhabi raids to merchants in the Persian Gulf. With the opening of the Suez Canal, trade from the Persian Gulf is increasingly valuable and it is important that we exert as much power and influence in the region. The Arabian peninsula is divided between the al-Saud and al-Rashid families, and although we crushed the Wahhabi Saudi family once, they keep coming back.

The small island in the Persian Gulf has long been dominated by Arab families and small sheikdoms. The borders are volatile and our country rulers have claimed the area more than once in history. It's time to once again claim our land there and conquer the peninsula.

Our land is not what it once was and invaders surround our territory. There are some in our country that believe that in order to survive, we need to give our independence and ask for protection, becoming a vassal, of the Cape colony.
While independent for a long time, Montenegro never had its full borders officially recognized, leading to claims from Croatia and Bosnia. It's time to change that.

$CAPITAL$ is an old city but the cramped, medieval-style streets and buildings certainly doesn't do it any favours. In order to implement a modern transportation network and to eliminate potential sanitary problems, we can invest in a renovation of $CAPITAL$ to make it a city worthy of being a capital of $COUNTRY$.

Bulgaria is the largest Christian nation in the Balkans in terms of territory and population and is experiencing an economic and cultural revival. Europeans are beginning to speak of “the Bulgarian miracle,” calling Bulgarians the “Prussians” or the “Japanese” of the Balkans. Only time will tell if this miracle will build an enduring legacy and a great nation, or if it will be a one-time thing. For now, we will reap its benefits.
Bulgaria has the right to include all Bulgarian-inhabited lands in the former Ottoman Empire. The Balkans will be stabilized under the might of the Bulgarian Empire.

The nomads of the Saharan desert have always been too trouble with not enough benefits to be kept under control. With the Great Powers quickly setting out to carve Africa, establishing proper borders and proper control of even remote regions becomes a necessity. We can  strike out a series of treaties to set up the Saharan frontier of our territories and eliminate any possibility of border conflicts in the Sahara.
With the end of the South/North Peru division, these olds boundaries become useless. It's time to end the notion of a separated Peru.

Surrounded and out-maneuvered, and following an encounter at Paucarpata with an army under the command of Santa Cruz, Admiral Blanco Encalada was forced to sign a peace treaty. The Treaty of Paucarpata agreed to the devolution of all captured ships by Chile, the restoration of commercial relations between the Confederation and Chile, the withdrawal of all Chilean troops from Confederate territories and the payment by the Confederacy of the former Peruvian foreign debts with Chile. The Chilean troops were reembarked. When Admiral Blanco Encalada returned rather ignominiously to Valparaíso with the fleet and the army in December, 1837, the scandal was gigantic. The Chilean government and the Chilean public opinion repudiated the treaty in indignation. Admiral Blanco Encalada as was thrown into jail and tried for high treason, together with his advisor Antonio José de Irisarri, who had refused to even return to Chile.
The Natives' Status: The Suppression Act
